21.21: Ninh ziangh nyei hlaax-nyieqc buangv, ninh corc haih jangx ganh nyei hmuangv doic fai?
21.15: Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh se haaix dauh, yie mbuo cingx daaih oix zuqc fu-sux ninh? Se gorngv yie mbuo jouh ninh yie mbuo duqv haaix nyungc longx?’
21.12: Ninh mbuo gan nzoz caux daanh baah nyei qiex baaux nzung, aengx longc hlauv-ndongh nux nyei qiex zoux nauc nyitc.
21.17: “Orqv mienh nyei dang zuqc daic ndongc haaix maqc? Ninh mbuo zuqc kuonx naanh nyei sic ndongc haaix maqc? Ninh mbuo zuqc Tin-Hungh qiex jiez, bun zeqc naanc ninh mbuo ndongc haaix maqc?
21.30: se zuqc zeqc naanc nyei hnoi orqv mienh duqv njoux, Tin-Hungh qiex jiez nyei hnoi yaac duqv biaux ndutv.
21.20: Tov bun ninh mbuo ganh nyei m'zing buatc ninh mbuo ganh zuqc mietc. Bun ninh mbuo hiuv duqv Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh qiex jiez haic ninh mbuo.
21.4: “Yie aeqv, yie maiv zeiz caux baamh mienh nzaeng. Wuov nyungc yie weic haaix diuc maiv zuqc hnyouv beqv?
21.28: Weic zuqc meih mbuo gorngv, ‘Zoux hlo wuov dauh nyei biauv ih zanc yiem haaix? Orqv mienh yiem jiex nyei ndopv-liuh yiem haaix?’
21.33: Weic ninh wuov norm horngz nyei nie heng nyei. Zuangx mienh gan jienv ninh mingh, mingh ndaangc nyei mienh saauv maiv hingh.
21.19: Meih mbuo gorngv, ‘Tin-Hungh siou jienv orqv mienh nyei zuiz weic bun ninh mbuo nyei fu'jueiv zuqc dingc.’ Tov Tin-Hungh winh bun orqv mienh ganh, weic bun ninh mbuo ganh hiuv.
21.34: “Meih mbuo ni? Meih mbuo kungx hnamv longc kungx-waac orn yie nyei hnyouv? Meih mbuo dau nyei waac maiv maaih haaix nyungc cuotv liuz nduov mienh nyei waac.”
21.18: Ninh mbuo hnangv zuqc nziaaux buonc nyei mbiauh nqaauv, yaac hnangv mbieqv nor, zuqc domh nziaaux buonc ndongc haaix maqc?
21.22: “Maaih haaix dauh haih zorqv wuonh zaang njaaux Tin-Hungh? Weic zuqc ninh zungv siemv yiem hlang wuov deix.
21.23: Maaih laanh mienh daic nyei ziangh hoc, sin zaangc wangc siangx, henv nyei, kuh yiem, baengh orn nyei.
21.13: Ninh mbuo yiem seix zaangc nyei hnoi-nyieqc duqv longx, ninh mbuo baengh orn nyei njiec yiemh gen.
21.9: Ninh mbuo nyei biauv baengh orn nyei, maiv zuqc gamh nziex nyei sic. Tin-Hungh nyei biaav yaac maiv mborqv ninh mbuo.
21.26: Ninh mbuo fih hnangv nyei daic, bueix jienv nie-mbung gu'nyuoz, maaih gaeng-mau buang jienv ninh mbuo.
21.5: Mangc yie maah! Ziouc haeqv meih mbuo gamh nziex, yaac longc buoz buang jienv nzuih.
21.27: “Yie hiuv duqv meih mbuo nyei hnyouv hnangv haaix nor hnamv, caux meih mbuo daav maiv benx nyei za'eix hoic yie.
21.14: Ninh mbuo gorngv mbuox Tin-Hungh, ‘Leih nqoi yie mbuo maah! Yie mbuo maiv oix hiuv meih nyei jauv-louc.
21.3: Tov diev jienv muangx yie gorngv. Yie gorngv liuz sueih meih mbuo jatv aqv.
21.7: “Tin-Hungh weic haaix diuc bun orqv mienh duqv ziangh jienv, duqv siouc nyuonh ndaauv, maaih qaqv henv jienv faaux?
21.10: Ninh mbuo nyei ngongh gouv douc buonv maiv dangx, ngongh nyeiz njiec dorn, dorn yaac maiv mbaang.
21.2: “Tov meih mbuo longx-longx nyei muangx yie nyei waac, hnangv naaic meih mbuo ziouc orn yie nyei hnyouv.
21.31: Haaix dauh dorng jienv orqv mienh gorngv ninh? Ziux ninh zoux nyei haaix dauh winh bun ninh?
21.6: Yie haaix zanc jangx taux, gamh nziex gau, ziangh sin zinx nzengc aqv.
21.8: Ninh mbuo nyei dorn-jueiv dorng jienv ninh mbuo liepc wuonv, ninh mbuo nyei m'zing duqv buatc ninh mbuo nyei fun-faqv hlo daaih.
21.24: Ninh nyei sin henv, ndin nyei, ninh nyei mbungv-fim nyiemz nyei.
21.25: Aengx maaih laanh mienh daic nyei ziangh hoc, hnyouv maiv maaih yietc deix orn-lorqc. Ziangh seix maiv duqv haaix nyungc longx.
21.29: Meih mbuo maiv duqv naaic jiex jauv nyei mienh fai? Meih mbuo maiv hiuv duqv ninh mbuo zoux nyei zorng-zengx,
21.11: Ninh mbuo bun ninh mbuo nyei fu'jueiv-faix cuotv hnangv ba'gi yungh guanh, ninh mbuo nyei naamh nyouz cangx heix.
21.32: Gaeng ninh mingh taux zouv wuov zanc, zungv maaih mienh zuov jienv ninh nyei zouv aqv.
21.16: Ninh mbuo duqv longx se ninh mbuo kaux ninh mbuo ganh nyei qaqv. Orqv mienh caangh laangh nyei za'eix yie simv nqoi.

15.21: Za'gengh! gamh nziex haic nyei qiex yiem ninh nyei m'normh, baengh orn nyei ziangh hoc, janx-zaqc ziouc daaih caangv aqv.
15.15: Tin-Hungh zungv maiv bungx hnyouv ninh nyei cing-nzengc fin-mienh. Ziux Tin-Hungh mangc, lungh yaac maiv cing-nzengc.
15.12: Meih weic haaix diuc sueih ganh nyei hnyouv, meih nyei m'zing weic haaix diuc cuotv douz,
15.17: “Muangx yie maah! Yie oix mbuox meih. Yie buatc jiex nyei, yie oix gorngv,
15.30: Mienh biaux maiv ndutv hmuangx. Douz yaac oix buov nqaai ninh nyei cunx. Tin-Hungh nyei qiex yaac oix biomv ninh mingh mi'aqv.
15.20: Orqv mienh yiem seix zaangc nyei yietc zungv hnoi-nyieqc zuqc siouc kouv. Se zeix mienh nyei mienh waaic mienh ziux ninh nyei yietc zungv hnyangx-soux.
15.4: Mv baac taaih Tin-Hungh wuov nyungc hnyouv meih guangc mi'aqv, yaac dangv jienv maiv duqv yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien fei-fangv nyei jauv.
15.28: ninh duqv yiem zingh huaang, yiem mienh maiv horpc zuqc yiem nyei biauv, se dingc daaih oix zuqc benx mbaang waaic nyei ga'naaiv-ndui.
15.33: Ninh yaac hnangv a'ngunc hmei maiv gaengh zuoqc nyei biouv bioh ndortv nzengc, yaac hnangv ga'lanv ndiangx nyei biangh nqoi daaih bioh mi'aqv.
15.35: Ninh mbuo hnamv cuotv orqv sic hnangv maaih gu'nguaaz faaux sin, yungz cuotv benx waaic sic hnangv. Ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv liuc leiz nduov mienh.”
15.19: (Naaiv norm deic-bung kungx ninh mbuo ganh duqv nzipc, yaac maiv maaih ganh fingx mienh yangh ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx jiex.)
15.34: Maiv taaih Tin-Hungh wuov deix maiv maaih hoz doic zeiv-fun, a'hneiv kaux nyaanh hmuangx wuov deix nyei ndopv-liuh yaac oix zuqc douz buov qui.
15.18: dongh cong-mengh mienh gorngv jiex, yiem ninh mbuo nyei ong-taaix nzipc jienv daaih yaac maiv bingx.
15.22: Ninh maiv sienx ninh haih yiem hmuangx gu'nyuoz nzuonx. Ninh zungv oix zuqc nzuqc ndaauv daix.
15.23: Ninh youh jienv mingh lorz nyanc yaac gorngv, ‘Yiem haaix maaih nyanc hopv?’ Ninh hiuv duqv hmuangx nyei hnoi-nyieqc yiem ninh nyei buoz ga'hlen.
15.13: bun meih nyei hnyouv ngaengc Tin-Hungh yaac bun naaiv nyungc waac yiem meih nyei nzuih cuotv?
15.9: Maaih haaix nyungc meih hiuv, yie mbuo maiv hiuv? Maaih haaix nyungc meih mengh baeqc, yie mbuo maiv mengh baeqc?
15.26: ziouc nanv jienv hoz nyei torngv-baaih ngaengc jienv bieqc mingh mborqv ninh.
15.5: Weic zuqc meih nyei zuiz njaaux meih nyei nzuih gorngv waac, meih yaac ginv longc guv guaix mienh nyei mbietc.
15.27: “Weic zuqc ninh nyei hmien junc haic, ninh nyei jaaiv benx orv-junc,
15.14: “Baamh mienh hnangv haaix nor ninh cingx daaih haih cing-nzengc? Fai yiem m'sieqv dorn cuotv seix nyei mienh hnangv haaix nor haih benx zoux horpc nyei mienh?
15.3: Ninh longc maiv maaih eix leiz nyei waac fai tengx maiv duqv haaix nyungc nyei waac jaiv sin fai?
15.7: “Meih dongh cuotv seix ndaangc nyei daauh dauh baamh mienh fai? Meih cuotv seix ndaangc Tin-Hungh zeix mbong fai?
15.10: Yiem yie mbuo mbu'ndongx maaih mba'biei baeqc nyei mienh caux hnyangx-jeiv gox nyei mienh, zungv gauh gox meih nyei die.
15.2: “Cong-mengh mienh longc maiv lamh longc nyei wuonh zaang dau, yaac bun dong bung nyei nziaaux buangv nzengc ziangh sin se horpc nyei fai?
15.31: Maiv dungx bun ninh kaux maiv lamh longc nyei haaix nyungc nduov ganh, weic zuqc maiv lamh longc nyei oix winh nzuonx bun ninh.
15.6: Meih ganh nyei nzuih dingc meih zoux dorngc, maiv zeiz yie. Meih ganh nyei joux-joux waac zoux zorng-zengx gox meih.
15.8: Tin-Hungh caangh laangh nyei wuic gapv zunv nyei ziangh hoc meih haiz nyei fai? Meih liouh jienv cong-mengh weic meih ganh longc fai?
15.24: Ninh oix zuqc zeqc naanc kuonx kouv bun ninh gamh nziex, yaac hingh jiex ninh hnangv hungh diex liuc leiz mborqv jaax nor.
15.25: Weic zuqc ninh nyuotv buoz-juonh bun Tin-Hungh, yaac ngaengc jienv Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh,
15.29: Ninh ziouc maiv duqv butv zoih. Ninh nyei zinh zoih yaac maiv duqv yiem lauh. Ninh nyei jaa-dingh maiv duqv yiem deic-bung hiaangx.
15.11: Tin-Hungh longc suonc nyei waac orn meih nyei hnyouv. Meih haiz se maiv gaengh gaux fai?
15.32: Ninh nyei hnoi-nyieqc maiv gaengh taux ninh ziouc zuqc winh sung, ninh nyei nquaah yaac maiv maeng aqv.
15.16: Wuov nyungc waaic haic, youx haic nyei mienh, se hopv zuiz dorngx wuom nyei mienh, gauh fatv maiv haih cing-nzengc.

37.21: Ih zanc nziaaux buonc mbuonx mingh, lungh ziouc nzang, njang aengv jienv, baamh mienh ziouc maiv haih mangc lungh nyei njang.
37.15: Meih hiuv nyei fai? Tin-Hungh hnangv haaix nor hatc naaiv deix ga'naaiv, bun mba'lingc yiem mbuonx gu'nyuoz ziux cuotv?
37.12: Ziux Tin-Hungh paaiv, ninh mbuo guinh mingh guinh daaih, youh gormx lungh ndiev zoux ziangx ei jienv ninh hatc nyei yietc zungv.
37.17: Naamh bung nyei nziaaux bun ndau jorm zongc-zongc nyei, meih yuoqv, lui-houx hnangv douz nor jorm.
37.20: Oix zuqc mbuox ninh, yie oix caux ninh gorngv waac fai? Maaih haaix laanh mienh ganh oix tov zuqc mietc?
37.4: Nqa'haav maaih ninh nyei qiex njunh jienv daaih, ninh maaih haangh daauh nyei qiex hnangv mba'ong nor mbui, ninh nyei qiex mbui wuov zanc, ninh maiv dangv jienv mba'lingc.
37.19: “Tov njaaux yie mbuo, yie mbuo oix zuqc hnangv haaix nor caux Tin-Hungh gorngv. Yie mbuo hnyouv hngongx, hnamv maiv cuotv waac gorngv.
37.18: Meih haih hnangv Tin-Hungh corng lungh, yaac bun lungh ngaengc hnangv nzaatv daaih nyei dongh siqv gingx fai?
37.22: Yiem baqv bung maaih njang-laangc cuotv hnangv jiem nor, Tin-Hungh daaih yaac maaih gamh nziex nyei haangh daauh.
37.23: “Yie mbuo maiv haih mingh nitv fatv Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh. Ninh maaih domh qaqv, maaih baengh fim, ninh zoux duqv horpc haic, yaac maiv zeix mienh.
37.13: Ninh bun naaiv deix jauv cuotv daaih weic dingc zuiz fai weic yungz ndau-beih, fai weic zuqc ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
37.9: Nziaaux-jieqv yiem naamh bung cuotv daaih, juangv nyei qiex yiem baqv bung nyei nziaaux cuotv.
37.5: Tin-Hungh nyei qiex mbui cuotv haiz mbuoqc horngh haic. Ninh zoux hlo haic nyei sic, yie mbuo zungv maiv haih bieqc hnyouv.
37.14: “Yopv aah! Dingh jienv longx-longx nyei muangx taux Tin-Hungh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
37.3: Ninh bungx mba'lingc cuotv buangv lungh ndiev, ninh nyei mba'lingc mingh jomc lungh gorn.
37.7: Ninh bun dauh dauh mienh nyei buoz dingh njiec, weic bun zeix daaih nyei maanc mienh hiuv duqv ninh nyei gong.
37.10: Tin-Hungh nyei qiex bun wuom gitv sorng, wuom-taan yaac gitv ngaengc nzengc.
37.2: Muangx maah! Muangx Tin-Hungh nyei qiex mbui hnangv mba'ong nor, muangx yiem ninh nyei nzuih cuotv njunh njunh nyei qiex.
37.1: “Naaiv deix sic bun yie nyei mba'nziu dongz mbokc mbokc nyei, ndanc zuqc yie nyei wuonh ndaix, daamv mapv nzengc.
37.6: Weic zuqc ninh mbuox sorng, ‘Duih njiec ndau-beih maah!’ Yaac mbuox mbiungc caux mbiungc-nziaaux, ‘Oix zuqc henv aqv.’
37.8: Hieh zoih bieqc ninh mbuo nyei zunh, yaac yiem ninh mbuo nyei kuotv gu'nyuoz.
37.24: Weic naaiv mienh taaih ninh. Da'faanh ceng ganh maaih cong-mengh nyei mienh ninh maiv taaih aqv.”
37.11: Ninh bun mbuonx-hoz maaih wuom buangv nzengc, bun mba'lingc yiem mbuonx faatv cuotv.
37.16: Meih hiuv duqv mbuonx hnangv haaix nor mbiouh jienv ndaamv-lungh nyei fai? Se maaih dunh yunh nyei wuonh zaang wuov dauh zoux nyei mbuoqc horngh sic.

12.21: Ninh mangc piex zoux hlo nyei mienh, yaac zorqv nqoi henv wuov deix nyei qaqv.
12.15: Se gorngv ninh dangv jienv wuom, wuom ziouc nqaai. Se gorngv ninh bungx wuom cuotv, wuom ziouc yiemx ndau-beih.
12.12: Mienh gox mienh maaih cong-mengh. Siouc nyuonh ndaauv nyei mienh gauh haih bieqc hnyouv.
12.17: Ninh se zorqv nzengc caangh laangh mienh nyei cong-mengh, yaac bun siemv zuiz jien benx ga'naaiv-hngongx.
12.20: Ninh bun ziepc zuoqv nyei mienh sekv nzieqc, maiv haih gorngv waac, yaac zorqv nqoi mienh gox nyei cong-mengh.
12.4: “Yie benx yie nyei doic jatv nyei ga'naaiv. Zinh ndaangc yie jouh Tin-Hungh, ninh yaac dau yie. Yie se baengh fim, maiv lamh nqemh dorngx nyei mienh, yaac zuqc mienh jatv aqv.
12.19: Ninh zorqv sai mienh laengh gaengv nyei dorh mingh, yaac mbienv maaih lingc maaih qaqv nyei mienh.
12.18: Ninh jaiv nqoi hungh diex ndoh mienh nyei limc, aengx longc hlaang sai jienv hungh nyei jaaiv.
12.22: Ninh bun yiem ndo, hmuangx nyei sic hinc cuotv, yaac dorh mapv hmuangx nyei dorngx bieqc njang.
12.23: Ninh bun guoqv henv, yaac mietc ninh mbuo. Ninh bun baeqc fingx hiaangx camv, aengx guaatv ninh mbuo mingh.
12.13: “Tin-Hungh maaih cong-mengh caux qaqv. Ninh maaih za'eix yaac haih bieqc hnyouv.
12.9: Yiem naaiv deix yietc zungv maaih haaix nyungc maiv hiuv duqv Ziouv nyei buoz hnangv naaiv zoux?
12.5: Orn-lorqc nyei mienh yiem hnyouv mangc piex zuqc zeqc naanc nyei mienh, zeqc naanc zungv zuov jienv zaux mbaqc piatv nyei mienh.
12.14: Tin-Hungh caeqv nyei, maiv maaih haaix dauh haih ceix jiez. Ninh wuonx mienh, maiv maaih haaix dauh haih bungx.
12.3: Mv baac yie yaac maaih cong-mengh caux meih mbuo fih hnangv nyei. Yie maiv gauh aiv meih mbuo. Meih mbuo gorngv naaiv deix sic fungc maaih haaix dauh maiv hiuv laeh?
12.7: “Gunv naaic saeng-kuv, saeng-kuv ziouc njaaux meih. Naaic yiem lungh nyei norqc, ninh mbuo ziouc mbuox meih.
12.10: Da'faanh ziangh jienv maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv caux zuangx baamh mienh tauv nyei qiex yiem ninh nyei buoz.
12.2: “Zeiz aqv, meih mbuo za'gengh guai haic nyei mienh. Cong-mengh yaac oix caux meih mbuo yietc njiec daic.
12.6: Janx-zaqc nyei ndopv-liuh baengh orn nyei, cuoqv Tin-Hungh nyei mienh yiem duqv wuonv, maiv gunv ninh mbuo longc ganh nyei qaqv dorngx zienh.
12.8: Caux ndau gorngv waac, ndau ziouc njaaux meih, yiem koiv nyei mbiauz yaac oix zunh mengh mbuox meih.
12.24: Ninh zorqv lungh ndiev baeqc fingx nyei bieiv zeiv nyei cong-mengh mingh mi'aqv, yaac bun ninh mbuo youh jienv gan maiv maaih jauv nyei deic-bung-huaang mingh.
12.25: Ninh mbuo yiem hmuangx gu'nyuoz huaax jienv mingh, maiv maaih njang. Ninh yaac bun ninh mbuo lungh lungh laih laih hnangv diuv nquin nyei mienh nor.
12.11: M'normh maiv zeiz haih seix waac hnangv mbietc seix nyanc hopv nyei mueix fai?
12.16: Tin-Hungh maaih qaqv, maaih cong-mengh, zuqc nduov nyei caux nduov mienh nyei mienh yiem ninh nyei buoz-ndiev.

17.15: wuov nyungc yie maaih lamh hnamv nyei yiem haaix? Yie maaih lamh hnamv nyei haaix dauh duqv buatc?
17.12: Yie nyei loz-gaeng doic bun lungh muonz zanc benx lungh hnoi zanc. Ninh mbuo gorngv, ‘Njang se nitv fatv hmuangx.’
17.13: Se gorngv yie maaih lamh hnamv yiemh gen benx yie nyei biauv, se gorngv yie bueix njiec hmuangx nyei dorngx,
17.5: Mienh maaic ganh nyei gorx-youz weic duqv zinh nyaanh, ninh nyei fu'jueiv oix zuqc siouc kouv.
17.11: “Yie nyei hnoi-nyieqc jiex mi'aqv. Yie daav nyei za'eix, se yiem hnyouv hnamv nyei, dangx mi'aqv.
17.14: se gorngv yie mbuox zouv, ‘Meih zoux yie nyei die,’ yaac mbuox gaeng-mau, ‘Meih se yie nyei maa,’ fai ‘Yie nyei dorc,’
17.3: “Tin-Hungh aac, tov meih zoux buv-jaa beu yie. Cuotv liuz meih, maaih haaix dauh oix weic yie zoux buv-jaa?
17.10: “Mv baac meih mbuo, se meih mbuo yietc zungv, gunv aengx daaih nzunc. Yiem meih mbuo mbu'ndongx yie zungv lorz maiv buatc yietc dauh cong-mengh mienh.
17.2: Zien nyei, maaih jatv yie nyei mienh weih gormx yie, yie nyei m'zing yaac mangc jienv ninh mbuo cuoqv yie.
17.1: “Yie nyei mba'nziu yuqc, yie nyei hnoi-nyieqc yaac jiex mi'aqv. Zouv yaac zuov jienv yie.
17.4: Meih bun ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv maiv haih mengh baeqc. Weic naaiv meih ziouc maiv bun ninh mbuo hingh jiex.
17.6: “Tin-Hungh bun yie yiem baeqc fingx mbu'ndongx zoux gouv gorngv. Ninh mbuo yaac tuiv wuom-nzuih naetv yie nyei hmien.
17.8: Hnyouv zingx nyei mienh laaix naaiv deix sic za'gengh! gamh nziex haic. Maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh jiez daaih gorngv yie maiv gan Tin-Hungh.
17.9: Kuv mienh gan longx ninh yangh nyei jauv. Buoz cing-nzengc nyei mienh gunv zoux gunv henv jienv faaux.
17.7: Laaix nzauh kouv yie nyei m'zing maiv njang aqv. Yie nyei buoz-zaux hnangv dongh linh nor.
17.16: Yie maaih lamh hnamv nyei oix njiec taux yiemh gen nyei gaengh fai? Yie mbuo lomh nzoih oix njiec nie-mbung fai?”

30.21: Meih tiuv hnyouv zoux doqc yie, longc meih henv haic nyei buoz zeix yie.
30.15: Gamh nziex haic nyei sic hoic yie kouv haic, yie nyei njang-laangc jiex hnangv nziaaux buonc mingh nor, yie nyei fuqv-loqc yaac hnangv mbuonx jiex mi'aqv.
30.12: Naaiv deix ceux lunc nyei mienh yiem yie nyei mbiaauc maengx jiez daaih, ninh mbuo fongv yie cuotv mingh. Ninh mbuo liuc leiz jauv mietc yie.
30.17: Lungh muonz zanc yie nyei mbungv hlam, nziuv-nziuv nyei mun yaac maiv maaih ziangh hoc dingh.
30.30: Yie nyei ndopv jieqv yaac nqorqv mi'aqv, yie nyei mbungv jorm hnangv douz buov nor.
30.20: “Tin-Hungh aac, yie heuc jienv meih, meih yaac maiv dau yie, yie souv jiez daaih, meih kungx bungx m'zing mangc hnangv.
30.4: Ninh mbuo gaeqv yiem deic-bung-huaang nyei ndiangx-normh, caux maiv maaih mueix nyei ndiangx-nzungh zoux nyanc hopv.
30.28: Yie nzauh, hmien hmuangx yaac maiv maaih nyutc ziux, yie souv jienv gapv zunv nyei wuic, heuc jienv tov tengx.
30.19: Tin-Hungh zorqv yie zoi njiec wuom-bamc ndorngh, yie ziouc benx nie-mbung caux saaiv mi'aqv.
30.18: Tin-Hungh nyei domh qaqv dorngx hnangv yie nyei lui, aengx hnangv lui-jaang nor naeqc jienv yie.
30.22: Meih bouh yie faaux yiem nziaaux gu'nguaaic, bun yie geh jienv nziaaux mingh, meih bun yie yiem domh nziaaux zuqc mbeu mingh mbeu daaih.
30.23: Yie hiuv duqv meih dorh yie mingh zuqc daic, se taux dingc ziangx dauh dauh ziangh jienv nyei mienh oix zuqc mingh nyei dorngx.
30.13: Ninh mbuo bun yie biaux nyei jauv dangx, aengx jaa zeqc naanc bun yie, yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh dangv ninh mbuo.
30.9: “Ih zanc naaiv deix mienh dorh yie benx nzung baaux, yaac dorh yie benx gouv gorngv.
30.26: Yie hnamv jienv oix duqv longx mv baac duqv ciouv. Yie zuov jienv njang mv baac hmuangx daaih taux.
30.5: Ninh mbuo yiem mienh mbu'ndongx zuqc zunc cuotv, mienh heuc jienv zunc hnangv zunc janx-zaqc nor.
30.27: Yie nyei hnyouv faan-fei lunc, maiv dingh yietc dangh, kouv naanc nyei hnoi-nyieqc morh jienv yie yiem.
30.14: Ninh mbuo ndutc ndutc nyei daaih hnangv bieqc zingh laatc tong nyei dorngx. Yiem baaic waaic nyei dorngx ninh mbuo wuz-wuz nyei daaih.
30.3: Laaix jomc kouv yaac ngorc, lungh muonz zanc yiem ndau-huaang ninh mbuo nyanc miev-nzungh nqaai.
30.7: Ninh mbuo yiem ndau-huaang hnangv hieh zoih nor heuc, yaac mbengx jienv yiem ndiangx-dorn-fomv ga'ndiev.
30.10: Ninh mbuo youx yie, simv yie go, yietv buatc yie ziouc tuiv wuom-nzuih naetv yie.
30.2: Ninh mbuo nyei buoz nyei qaqv haih tengx haaix nyungc yie? Ninh mbuo nyei qaqv-leqc nzengc mi'aqv.
30.1: “Mv baac gauh lunx yie wuov deix mienh jatv yie. Naaiv deix mienh nyei die yie buatc maiv zic duqv caux zuov yie nyei ba'gi yungh guanh nyei juv yiem.
30.31: Weic naaiv yie nyei daanh baah nyei qiex tiuv benx nzauh nyei qiex. Yie nyei hlauv-ndongh nux nyei qiex tiuv benx mienh nyiemv nyei qiex.
30.6: Ninh mbuo zuqc yiem ndoqv-zuonx nqaai yaac yiem ndau-kuotv caux mbaengx-ngaamh.
30.8: Ninh mbuo benx yietc guanh maiv lamh longc nyei haac horngh mienh, zuqc biaav-bin mborqv zunc cuotv deic-bung.
30.24: “Mv baac mienh yiem baaic waaic nyei ga'naaiv-ndui sung buoz, yaac yiem ninh zuqc nyei zeqc naanc heuc jienv tov tengx maiv zeiz?
30.25: Mienh ndortv naanc nyei ziangh hoc yie maiv zeiz weic ninh mbuo nyiemv fai? Yie nyei hnyouv maiv zeiz weic mienh jomc mienh nzauh fai?
30.29: Yie caux hieh juv benx muoz-doic, yaac caux norqc lorh torh zoux doic.
30.11: Weic zuqc Tin-Hungh bun yie mau, tengx maiv duqv ganh, ninh mbuo ziouc dorng jienv yie sueih eix zoux.
30.16: “Ih zanc yie nyei hnyouv za'gengh kouv haic, zuqc kouv nyei hnoi-nyieqc zorqv jienv yie.

20.21: Ninh nyanc liuz, maiv zengc haaix nyungc aqv. Weic naaiv ninh nyei fuqv-loqc maiv duqv yietc liuz yiem.
20.15: Orqv mienh naqv zinh zoih aengx lov cuotv, Tin-Hungh zoux bun wuov deix ga'naaiv yiem ninh nyei ga'sie baetv cuotv daaih.
20.12: “Maiv gunv orqv sic yiem ninh nyei nzuih se gaam nyei, yaac maiv gunv ninh fapv jienv ninh nyei mbietc ga'ndiev,
20.17: Ninh maiv duqv mangc ndoqv, se maaih mueiz-dorngh caux ngongh nyorx liouc cuotv nyei ndoqv.
20.20: “Weic zuqc ninh mauv nyei jauv maiv haih dingh, ninh a'hneiv nyei ga'naaiv yietc nyungc yaac maiv liouh aqv.
20.4: “Meih maiv hiuv fai? Yiem loz! hnoi daaih, dongh baamh mienh coqv hoqc duqv yiem baamh gen wuov zanc,
20.28: Ninh nyei jaa-dingh zungv zuqc dorh mingh nzengc aqv, yiem Tin-Hungh qiex jiez nyei hnoi zuqc guaatv mingh aqv.
20.19: Weic zuqc ninh zeix mienh jomc mienh aengx guangc ninh mbuo, yaac caangv maiv zeiz ninh ganh ceix daaih nyei biauv.
20.18: Ninh cuotv qaqv duqv daaih nyei ga'naaiv oix zuqc tuix nzuonx, yaac maiv duqv a'hneiv ninh maaiz maaic zornc daaih nyei ga'naaiv.
20.22: Ninh gauh benx jiex nyei ziangh hoc, ninh zuqc ndortv njiec kouv, yietc zungv siem nyei zeqc naanc ziouc daaih hoic ninh.
20.23: “Orqv mienh nyanc beuv, buangv ga'sie nyei ziangh hoc, Tin-Hungh nyei ga'qiex ziouc baetv cuotv bun ninh, yaac hnangv mbiungc nor njiec ninh nyei sin.
20.13: maiv gunv ninh maiv kangv liev cuotv, corc njorm jienv nzuih gu'nyuoz,
20.9: Buatc jiex ninh nyei mienh yietc liuz maiv duqv aengx buatc, ninh yiem nyei dorngx yaac maiv duqv aengx buatc ninh.
20.26: Ninh siou nyei zinh zoih oix zuqc mietc nzengc. Maiv zeiz mienh biomv nyei douz oix zorqv ninh buov qui. Yiem ninh nyei ndopv-liuh zengc njiec nyei ga'naaiv yaac zuqc buov mietc nzengc.
20.5: orqv mienh duqv hingh nyei ziangh hoc se nangv nyei, maiv gan Tin-Hungh nyei mienh nyei njien-youh yaac weic dangh baav hnangv.
20.27: Lungh oix bun cing ninh zoux nyei zuiz, ndau oix zoux zorng-zengx dingc ninh.
20.14: ninh nyanc nyei ga'naaiv yiem ga'sie tiuv mi'aqv, yiem hnyouv gu'nyuoz benx naang-jieqv nyei ndie-doqc.
20.3: Yie haiz meih gorngv-hemx nyei waac gorngv doqc yie, mv baac yie ganh nyei hnyouv hiuv duqv hnangv haaix nor dau.
20.7: ninh oix yietc liuz zuqc mietc, hnangv ninh ganh nyei nqaiv. Buatc jiex ninh nyei mienh oix gorngv, ‘Ninh jiex haaix mi'aqv?’
20.10: Ninh nyei dorn-jueiv oix zuqc jaauv sung mienh jomc mienh. Ganh nyei buoz oix zuqc tuix nzuonx ninh nyei zinh zoih.
20.2: “Yopv aah! Meih nyei waac bun yie hnyouv maiv longx, nyienz maiv jienv, oix zuqc dau aqv.
20.6: Maiv gunv ninh duqv zoux hlo, mbaengc gu'nguaaic lungh, ninh nyei m'nqorngv taux mbuonx,
20.8: Ninh hnangv norm mbeix jiex mi'aqv, lorz maiv buatc aqv, yaac hnangv lungh muonz zanc hinc yaangh nyei sic ninh mitc mi'aqv.
20.24: Ninh oix biaux hlieqv-jaa-sic, dongh siqv forng ziouc buonv tong ninh.
20.25: Ninh baeng forng cuotv, forng ziouc yiem ninh nyei sin cuotv daaih. Forng-cang dueiv-mueiz guoqv jienv daamv nyei wuom aengv cuotv njang, haeqv ninh gamh nziex! haic.
20.29: Naaiv se orqv mienh yiem Tin-Hungh duqv nyei buonc, se Tin-Hungh paaiv bun ninh nzipc.”
20.11: Ninh nyei mbungv maaih mienh lunx mienh nyei qaqv, mv baac oix zuqc caux ninh njiec benx nie-mbung.
20.16: Ninh oix sorqv naang-jieqv nyei ndie-doqc, naang-doqc oix nyorqv ninh daic.

4.21: Se gorngv yiem ninh mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh gu'nyuoz nyei hlaang zuqc baeng cuotv, ninh mbuo ziouc maiv daic yaac maiv maaih cong-mengh fai?’
4.15: Maaih gorng nziaaux zuqc yie nyei hmien, yie nyei sin-biei jiez nzengc.
4.18: Tin-Hungh zungv maiv bungx hnyouv ninh nyei bou, yaac gox ninh nyei fin-mienh zoux dorngc,
4.12: “Maaih joux waac sekv-sekv nyei taux yie, yie nyei m'normh haiz naaiv deix waac-sapv,
4.13: doix yie lungh muonz zanc m'njormh ndo nyei ziangh hoc, mbeix mbeix maiv benx, hnamv naaiv hnamv wuov,
4.19: hnangv naaic ninh gauh maiv bungx hnyouv longc nie zoux daaih nyei baamh mienh, se maaih nie-mbung zoux gorn-ndoqv yaac haih zuqc mietc hnangv baeqc yieqc.
4.5: Mv baac ih zanc zeqc naanc taux meih, meih ziouc maiv maaih noic, zeqc naanc zuqc meih, meih ziouc hnyouv mau aqv.
4.20: Yiem lungh ndorm taux lungh hmuangx mbu'ndongx ninh mbuo zuqc mietc, yietc liuz maiv maaih haaix dauh liuc leiz.
4.11: Sienh henv maiv maaih ga'naaiv zorqv nyanc ziouc daic mi'aqv. Sienh nyeiz nyei dorn yaac zuqc nzaanx nzengc.
4.14: haeqv yie gamh nziex, sin zinx, bun yie ziangh sin nyanh nyanh nyei.
4.3: Hnamv mangc gaax meih ganh njaaux mienh camv, yaac tengx mau nyei buoz henv jiez daaih.
4.10: Sienh heuc nyei qiex caux sienh ciouv nyei qiex sekv, sienh lunx nyei nyaah zuqc nauv.
4.2: “Se gorngv mienh caux meih gorngv joux waac, meih diev duqv nyei fai? Mv baac haaix dauh haih nyienz jienv maiv gorngv?
4.4: Meih nyei waac baav jienv ndiqv zuqc ndorpc nyei mienh, meih yaac tengx mau nyei cingh mborqc henv jiez daaih.
4.6: Meih taaih Tin-Hungh ziouc bun meih maaih lamh kaux maiv zeiz? Meih zoux nyei sic maiv maaih dorngx nqemh, ziouc bun meih maaih lamh hnamv maiv zeiz?
4.8: Yie buatc jiex, zoux orqv  haaz waaic sic nyei nyim nyei mienh, ziouc hnangv wuov nor siou.
4.9: Tin-Hungh biomv qiex bun ninh mbuo zuqc mietc, ninh nyei ga'qiex baetv cuotv bun ninh mbuo zutc nzengc.
4.7: “Hnamv mangc gaax! Maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh maaih haaix dauh zuqc mietc jiex nyei fai? Maaih haaix dauh hnyouv zingx nyei mienh zuqc pai guangc?
4.17: ‘Baamh mienh haih yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien baengh fim nyei fai? Baamh mienh haih yiem Zeix Ninh Daaih Wuov Dauh nyei nza'hmien cing-nzengc nyei fai?
4.16: Nziaaux dingh yaac maaih nyungc yiem wuov, mv baac yie mangc maiv cuotv ninh nyei fangx zeiv. Yie nyei m'zing buatc nyungc ga'naaiv nyei fangx, sekv nzieqc nyei. Nqa'haav yie haiz qiex gorngv,

28.21: Cong-mengh se bingx jienv yietc zungv maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv nyei m'zing, yaac gem jienv yiem ndaamv-lungh nyei norqc.
28.15: “Longc jiem maaiz yaac maiv duqv, yaac maiv haih nziang nyaanh zic ninh nyei jaax-zinh.
28.12: “Mv baac cong-mengh aeqv, oix zuqc mingh haaix ndau lorz? Wuonh zaang nyei dorngx yiem haaix?
28.17: jiem caux jaaix nyei gingx yaac beiv maiv taux. Yaac maiv haih longc zien jiem nyei jaa-sic maaiz ndutv.
28.20: Wuov nyungc cong-mengh yiem haaix daaih? Wuonh zaang nyei dorngx yiem haaix?
28.4: Ninh mbuo yiem leih mienh nyei dorngx go nyei, wetv ndau-ndiev nyei kuotv, jiex jauv nyei mienh zungv maiv jangx ninh mbuo. Ninh mbuo leih duqv mienh go, yiem kuotv gu'nyuoz nanv jienv hlaang ndioux mingh ndioux daaih.
28.28: Tin-Hungh gorngv mbuox mienh, ‘Oix zuqc taaih Ziouv, naaiv se cong-mengh. Yaac oix zuqc guangc orqv sic, naaiv se wuonh zaang.’+”
28.19: E^ti^o^bie yangh ungv nyei la'bieiv-jaaix yaac maiv haih beiv maiv taux, zien jiem nyei jaax-zinh yaac beiv maiv zaaic aqv.
28.18: Liemh maiv zuqc gorngv taux yiem koiv jaaix nyei la'bieiv fai nzang jiex nyei gingx, cong-mengh nyei jaax-zinh se gauh jaaix jiex jaaix nyei la'bieiv-zou.
28.22: Zuqc mietc nyei dorngx caux yiemh gen gorngv, ‘Yie mbuo nyei m'normh haiz deix waac-nziaaux gorngv taux cong-mengh.’
28.23: “Tin-Hungh mengh baeqc lorz cong-mengh wuov diuh jauv, yaac hiuv duqv cong-mengh yiem nyei dorngx.
28.13: Mienh maiv hiuv duqv cong-mengh nyei jaax-zinh, yiem yaangh gen lorz maiv buatc.
28.9: “Mienh sung buoz mborqv ngaengc haic nyei la'bieiv, wetv mbong njiec taux gorn.
28.26: ninh paaiv ziangx mbiungc nyei soux mouc, yaac dingc mba'lingc douz nyei jauv,
28.5: Ndau-beih aeqv, cuotv laangh ziqc, mv baac ndau-ndiev lunc nzengc hnangv zuqc douz buov nor.
28.27: wuov zanc ninh buatc cong-mengh yaac gorngv se longx nyei. Ninh liepc jiez yaac zaah mangc.
28.14: Ndau-ndiev nyei wuom gorngv, ‘Cong-mengh maiv yiem yie gu'nyuoz.’ Koiv yaac gorngv, ‘Cong-mengh maiv caux yie yiem.’
28.3: Mienh bun hmuangx nyei dorngx tiuv benx njang. Ninh mbuo zimh lorz yiem go jiex nyei dorngx, yiem mapv hmuangx nyei dorngx wetv cuotv la'bieiv.
28.7: “Wuov diuh jauv maiv maaih haaix norm domh jaangv hiuv, domh jaangv-ngongh nyei m'zing yaac maiv buatc jiex.
28.10: Ninh yiem la'bieiv-mbaengx gu'nyuoz wetv jauv, ninh nyei m'zing duqv buatc nyungc-nyungc jaaix nyei ga'naaiv.
28.2: Hlieqv yiem ndau-ndiev wetv cuotv daaih, dongh yaac yiem la'bieiv sinx daaih.
28.1: “Zien aqv, maaih wetv nyaanh nyei ciangv, yaac maaih dorngx sinx jiem.
28.6: Ndau-ndiev nyei la'bieiv maaih la'bieiv-jaaix mbuov nyei, la'bieiv gu'nyuoz yaac maaih jiem-mbuonv.
28.8: Ciouv nyei hieh zoih maiv caaiv jiex, sienh yaac maiv yangh jiex wuov.
28.24: Weic zuqc ninh mangc taux jomc ndau-beih, yaac buatc yiem lungh ndiev nyei nyungc-nyungc.
28.25: Tin-Hungh bun nziaaux maaih hniev-daauh wuov zanc, yaac longc ga'naaiv hlaau wuom,
28.11: Ninh zaeqv jienv wuom-nyuonh, maiv bun wuom saamx cuotv, bun bingx jienv nyei ga'naaiv cuotv daaih yiem njang.
28.16: Ofi nyei jiem caux jaaix haic nyei la'bieiv-jieqv baeqc fai mbuov nyei la'bieiv-jaaix yaac maaiz maiv ndutv,

33.21: Ninh jaic gau, sin zaangc soqv nzengc, mangc maiv buatc orv, zinh ndaangc maiv buatc nyei mbungv, ih zanc mbong cuotv daaih aqv.
33.15: Lungh muonz zanc mienh bueix jienv coux, m'njormh ndo nyei ziangh hoc, mbeix mbeix, buatc hinc yaangh nyei sic,
33.12: “Yopv aac, hnangv naaic meih dorngc mi'aqv. Yie oix dau meih. Tin-Hungh se gauh hlo jiex baamh mienh.
33.17: weic bun mienh leih nqoi zoux orqv nyei sic, yaac bun ninh mbuo maiv ceng-hlo zoux maux.
33.30: Ninh njoux mienh leih ndutv yiemh gen, bun ninh duqv a'hneiv nyei ziangh jienv.
33.20: Ninh nyei nzuih ziouc youx nyanc hopv, liemh kuv jiex nyei ga'naaiv yaac youx mi'aqv.
33.4: Tin-Hungh nyei Singx Lingh zeix yie, Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh nyei qiex bun yie maaih maengc.
33.28: Ninh njoux yie, bun yie maiv zuqc njiec taux yiemh gen, yie nyei maengc ziouc duqv buatc njang.’
33.33: Se gorngv meih maiv gorngv, tov muangx yie gorngv. Maiv dungx ko lo, yie ziouc zorqv cong-mengh nyei jauv njaaux meih.”
33.19: “Mienh yaac zuqc mborqv njaaux bueix jienv coux diev mun, ninh nyei mbungv yaac zanc-zanc mun.
33.18: Ninh dangv jienv bun mienh maiv zuqc bieqc yiemh gen, njoux ninh mbuo nyei maengc maiv zuqc daic.
33.22: Ninh nyei lingh wuonh taux fatv yiemh gen, ninh nyei maengc taux fatv mietc maengc wuov deix.
33.23: “Se gorngv maaih dauh fin-mienh daaih tengx ninh zoux mbu'ndongx mienh, se cin-waanc dauh nyei yietc dauh, bun mienh hiuv duqv zoux horpc nyei jauv.
33.13: Meih weic haaix diuc caux ninh nzaeng gorngv, ‘Ninh maiv dau yie nyei haaix joux waac’?
33.9: Meih gorngv, ‘Yie se cing-nzengc, maiv maaih zuiz. Yie cing-nzengc nyei, maiv dorngc haaix nyungc.
33.26: Ninh daux gaux jouh Tin-Hungh, Tin-Hungh ziouc zipv ninh, ninh njien-youh nyei mingh yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien. Tin-Hungh aengx bun ninh nzuonx daaih zoux kuv mienh hnangv loz wuov nor.
33.5: Se gorngv meih haih dau yie, dau maah! Liuc leiz ziangx meih nyei waac yaac souv jienv yie nyei nza'hmien.
33.27: Ninh yiem mienh nyei nza'hmien baaux nzung gorngv, ‘Yie baamz zuiz, buatc zoux dorngc nyei sic benx zoux horpc nyei jauv. Mv baac Tin-Hungh maiv ziux yie zoux nyei winh bun yie.
33.14: Tin-Hungh longc naaiv nyungc za'eix gorngv, longc wuov nyungc za'eix gorngv, mv baac mienh maiv longc hnyouv muangx.
33.3: Yie nyei waac bun cing yie nyei hnyouv zingx, ziux yie hiuv nyei jauv yie nyei nzuih meix gorngv.
33.7: Weic naaiv meih maiv zuqc gamh nziex yie, yie maiv zeiz oix longc qaqv zatv jienv meih.
33.10: Mv baac Tin-Hungh lorz sic hoic yie, yaac funx yie benx ninh nyei win-wangv.
33.2: Mangc maah! Ih zanc yie oix gorngv, yie liuc leiz ziangx gorngv aqv.
33.1: “Yopv aac, ih zanc tov muangx yie gorngv, muangx longx yie gorngv nyei yietc zungv waac.
33.31: “O Yopv aac, baeng m'normh muangx yie gorngv oc. Tov maiv dungx ko lo, yie ziouc gorngv.
33.6: Ziux Tin-Hungh mangc, yie caux meih fih hnangv, ninh yaac longc ndunh nie zeix yie daaih fih hnangv nyei.
33.8: “Meih gorngv nyei waac yie haiz mi'aqv. Meih gorngv waac nyei qiex bieqc yie nyei m'normh.
33.24: Wuov dauh fin-mienh korv-lienh ninh ziouc gorngv, ‘Tov njoux ninh, maiv dungx bun ninh mingh yiemh gen, yie lorz duqv zuoqc nyei jaax mi'aqv.’
33.25: Ninh nyei sin ziouc nzuonx lunx daaih hnangv fu'jueiv nyei, yaac henv jiez daaih hnangv mienh lunx mienh nyei hnoi-nyieqc nor.
33.29: “Tin-Hungh zoux naaiv deix yietc zungv sic bun mienh, i nzunc, buo nzunc.
33.11: Ninh zorqv ndiangx gapc jienv yie nyei zaux, aengx zuov jienv yie nyei diuh diuh jauv.’
33.32: Se gorngv meih maaih waac gorngv, dau yie maah! Gunv gorngv aqv. Yie a'hneiv muangx weic laengz meih se maiv dorngc.
33.16: Tin-Hungh bun ninh mbuo nyei m'normh muangx duqv haiz, yaac longc donv nyei waac haeqv ninh mbuo.

35.15: Ih zanc meih hnamv daaih, maiv gunv Tin-Hungh qiex jiez, ninh maiv dingc zuiz, mienh baamz zuiz ninh maiv gunv aqv.
35.12: Ninh mbuo heuc jienv tov tengx mv baac Tin-Hungh maiv dau, weic zuqc orqv mienh maux haic.
35.13: Ninh mbuo baeqc baeqc heuc, Tin-Hungh zungv maiv muangx. Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh maiv guen maiv sic nyei.
35.5: “Cau hmien mangc wuov lungh! Mangc yiem meih gu'nguaaic hlang nyei mbuonx.
35.11: Ninh njaaux yie mbuo gauh camv njaaux ndau-beih nyei hieh zoih, yaac bun yie mbuo maaih cong-mengh gauh camv yiem lungh nyei norqc.’
35.14: “Wuov nyungc, meih gorngv meih mangc maiv buatc Tin-Hungh, ninh ziouc gauh fatv maiv oix mangc meih. Meih yaac gorngv meih nyei sic yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien, meih yaac zuov jienv ninh.
35.3: meih cingx daaih naaic Tin-Hungh, ‘Yie duqv haaix nyungc longx? Yie maiv baamz zuiz yie duqv haaix nyungc gauh longx baamz zuiz wuov deix?’
35.10: Mv baac maiv maaih haaix dauh gorngv, ‘Zeix yie daaih Wuov Dauh Tin-Hungh, se bun mienh lungh muonz zanc baaux nzung wuov dauh, yiem haaix?
35.2: “Meih hnamv daaih naaiv se baengh fim nyei fai? Meih gorngv, ‘Yie gauh baengh fim Tin-Hungh?’
35.4: “Yie oix dau meih yaac dau caux meih yiem nyei loz-gaeng doic.
35.6: Se gorngv meih baamz zuiz, meih zoux haaix nyungc hoic Tin-Hungh? Se gorngv meih dorngc zuiz camv jienv faaux, meih nyei zuiz hnangv haaix nor zoux bun ninh?
35.8: Meih zoux orqv sic kungx hoic baamh mienh hnangv meih nor. Meih zoux kuv mienh kungx tengx baamh mienh duqv longx.
35.9: “Mienh laaix zuqc zeix camv ziouc heuc, ninh mbuo tov tengx biaux ndutv henv wuov deix nyei buoz.
35.7: Se gorngv meih zoux kuv mienh, meih jaa haaix nyungc bun ninh? Fai ninh yiem meih nyei buoz zipv haaix nyungc?
35.16: Weic naaiv Yopv gorngv jienv maiv lamh longc nyei waac mingh, gorngv waac camv yaac maiv hiuv ninh gorngv haaix nyungc.”

42.15: Yiem gormx wuov norm deic-bung lorz maiv duqv ndongc Yopv nyei sieqv nzueic. Yopv yaac bun ninh nyei sieqv duqv caux ninh mbuo nyei gorx, ninh mbuo nyei nauz, nzipc ninh nyei jaa-dingh.
42.12: Ziouv  ceix fuqv bun Yopv setv mueiz nyei hnoi duqv gauh camv zinh ndaangc nyei hnoi-nyieqc. Ninh maaih ba'gi yungh yietc waanc biei cin dauh, lorh torh juqv cin dauh, ngongh yietc cin doix, lorh nyeiz yietc cin dauh.
42.13: Ninh aengx maaih siec dauh dorn, buo dauh sieqv.
42.5: Zinh ndaangc yie nyei m'normh haiz mienh gorngv taux meih, mv baac ih zanc yie nyei m'zing duqv buatc meih.
42.11: Yopv nyei muoz-doic caux zinh ndaangc hiuv duqv ninh wuov deix mienh yietc zungv daaih lorz ninh yaac yiem ninh nyei biauv caux ninh nyanc hnaangx. Ninh mbuo yaac weic Ziouv  bun ninh zuqc orqv nyei yietc zungv zeqc naanc bun cing ninh mbuo korv-lienh ninh yaac orn ninh nyei hnyouv. Mouz dauh mienh bun norm nyaanh caux norm jiem-buoz-ndoqv-nzaeng.
42.14: Ninh tengx sieqv-hlo cuotv mbuox heuc Ye^mi^maa, da'nyeic dauh sieqv nyei mbuox heuc Ke^si^yaa, da'faam dauh sieqv nyei mbuox heuc Kelen Hapc^bukc.
42.3: Meih naaic, ‘Naaiv haaix dauh longc maiv maaih wuon-zaang nyei mienh gem jienv yie nyei za'eix?’ Weic naaiv yie gorngv yie maiv mengh baeqc nyei sic, se mbuoqc horngh haic nyei sic, zungv jiex ndaangc yie haih hiuv nyei.
42.10: Yopv weic ninh nyei loz-gaeng doic daux gaux liuz, Ziouv aengx bun Yopv duqv longx hnangv loz wuov nor. Ziouv aengx jaa tipv bun ninh gauh camv zinh ndaangc i gouv.
42.2: “Yie hiuv duqv maanc sic meih haih zoux nyei, meih nyei za'eix maiv maaih haaix nyungc haih dangv duqv jienv.
42.4: Meih gorngv, ‘Muangx yie maah! Yie oix gorngv. Yie oix naaic meih, tov meih dau yie.’
42.6: Weic naaiv yie youx yie ganh, yaac goiv hnyouv zueiz jienv nie-mbung caux saaiv-ndui.”
42.8: Ih zanc meih mbuo oix zuqc dorh siec dauh ngongh gouv caux siec dauh yungh gouv mingh taux yie nyei bou, Yopv, wuov, weic meih mbuo ganh fongc horc buov ziec. Yie nyei bou, Yopv, ziouc weic meih mbuo daux gaux, weic zuqc yie oix zipv ninh daux gaux nyei waac, maiv ziux meih mbuo zoux hngongx nyei jauv winh bun meih mbuo. Weic zuqc meih mbuo gorngv yie wuov deix waac se maiv horpc, maiv hnangv yie nyei bou, Yopv, gorngv nor.”
42.9: Temaan Mienh, E^li^fatv, caux Quwaa Mienh, Mbin^ndatc, caux Naa^aa^me Mienh, Sofaa, ziouc ei jienv Ziouv paaiv nyei waac zoux. Ziouv  yaac zipv Yopv daux gaux nyei waac.
42.7: Ziouv  caux Yopv gorngv liuz naaiv deix waac, Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Temaan Mienh, E^li^fatv, “Yie qiex jiez meih caux meih nyei i dauh loz-gaeng doic, weic zuqc meih mbuo gorngv yie wuov deix waac se maiv horpc, maiv hnangv yie nyei bou, Yopv, gorngv nor.
42.17: Yopv ziangh duqv siouc nyuonh ndaauv, hnyangx-jeiv gox ninh guei seix mi'aqv.
42.16: Nqa'haav Yopv aengx ziangh jienv yietc baeqv feix ziepc hnyangx yaac duqv buatc ninh nyei dorn caux ninh nyei fun-faqv njiec taux biei doic mienh.

19.21: “Loz-gaeng aah! Korv-lienh yie maah! Tov korv-lienh yie, weic zuqc Tin-Hungh nyei buoz mborqv yie.
19.15: Yiem yie nyei biauv nyei kaeqv mienh caux m'sieqv bou funx yie zoux ga'nyiec nyei mienh. Ziux ninh mbuo nyei m'zing mangc, yie zungv benx ganh fingx mienh.
19.12: Ninh nyei jun-baeng guanh lomh nzoih daaih. Ninh mbuo liuc leiz jauv mborqv yie, yaac liepc ciangv weih gormx yie.
19.17: Yie nyei auv youx yie nyei nzuih nyei qiex. Yie ganh nyei cien gorx cien youz gamh nziev yie.
19.20: Yie nyei ndopv naetv jienv mbungv, yie biaux cuotv singx maengc ndongc yietc norm hmeiv-nauv.
19.4: Se gorngv yie za'gengh zoux dorngc, yie zoux dorngc nyei kungx ndortv zuqc yie ganh hnangv.
19.28: “Se gorngv meih mbuo gorngv, ‘Yie mbuo hnangv haaix nor haih hoic ninh?’ Yaac gorngv, ‘Cuoqv sic nyei gorn-baengx yiem ninh ganh,’
19.19: Yie zuoqc jiex nyei yietc zungv loz-gaeng doic youx yie, dongh yie hnamv nyei mienh yaac mbienv hmien bun yie.
19.18: Liemh faix nyei fu'jueiv mangc piex yie. Yie jiez sin ninh mbuo gorngv yie.
19.22: Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc oix hoic yie hnangv Tin-Hungh hoic? Meih mbuo corc zoux doqc bun yie maiv gaengh gaux?
19.23: “Feix duqv yie gorngv nyei waac duqv fiev jienv, feix duqv faaux jienv yiem sou-daan.
19.13: Tin-Hungh bun yie nyei gorx-youz guangc yie, dongh yie zuoqc nyei mienh maiv laengz yie aqv.
19.9: Ninh zorqv nqoi yie nyei njang-laangc, yaac zorqv nqoi yie ndongx nyei ningv.
19.26: Zuov yie ndopv huv nzengc, yiem yie nyei orv sin yie zungv duqv buatc Tin-Hungh.
19.5: Se gorngv meih mbuo ceng meih mbuo ganh gauh hlo yie, yaac funx yie buangh nyei kouv naanc bun cing yie zoux dorngc,
19.27: Yie ganh duqv buatc ninh, yie ganh nyei m'zing duqv mangc ninh, yaac maiv zeiz ganh dauh. Yie nyei hnyouv mau kouv haic.
19.14: Yie nyei cien-ceqv leih nqoi yie, yie nyei loz-gaeng doic la'kuqv yie mi'aqv.
19.3: Meih mbuo gorngv doqc yie maiv zeiv ziepc nzunc aqv. Meih mbuo dorngc yie, meih mbuo maiv nyaiv fai?
19.7: “Yie heuc jienv gorngv, ‘Zuqc zoux doqc aav loh!’ yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh dau. Yie heuc jienv tov tengx, mv baac maiv duqv baengh fim nyei jauv.
19.10: Ninh weih jienv yie biei bung mborqv yie, yie ziouc baaic nzengc mi'aqv. Yie maaih lamh hnamv nyei, ninh baeng cuotv hnangv baeng diuh ndiangx nor.
19.2: “Meih mbuo oix zoux bun yie nyei hnyouv kouv, yaac longc waac morc yie ndongc haaix lauh?
19.6: wuov nyungc meih mbuo oix zuqc hiuv duqv se Tin-Hungh hnangv naaiv zoux bun yie, yaac longc ninh nyei mungz nzenc jienv yie.
19.8: Tin-Hungh dangv jienv yie nyei jauv yie ziouc jiex maiv duqv. Ninh yaac bun yie nyei jauv hmuangx mingh.
19.24: Feix duqv longc hlieqv-jaa-sic zuqc la'bieiv, aengx longc jungz dox zuqc liuz nyei dorngx, bun yietc liuz yiem.
19.25: Weic zuqc yie hiuv duqv Zuoqc yie Wuov Dauh ziangh jienv, setv mueiz ninh oix daaih souv jienv ndau-beih.
19.29: meih mbuo oix zuqc gamh nziex nzuqc ndaauv, weic zuqc Tin-Hungh qiex jiez, ninh longc nzuqc ndaauv dingc zuiz. Meih mbuo ziouc hiuv duqv maaih dauh siemv zuiz.”
19.11: Ninh qiex jiez, nouz haic yie, yaac funx yie benx ninh nyei win-wangv.
19.16: Yie heuc yie nyei bou mv baac ninh maiv dau, yie oix zuqc longc nzuih jouh ninh mbuo.

34.21: Tin-Hungh mangc jienv mienh nyei jauv, yaac buatc mienh nyei norm-norm zaux-mbiec.
34.15: da'faanh maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv ziouc liemh zeih daic, baamh mienh zuqc nzuonx benx nie-mbung.
34.37: Ninh ngaengc Tin-Hungh aengx jaa ninh nyei zuiz, ninh yiem yie mbuo mbu'ndongx mbaix buoz gorngv waac camv nyei huotv Tin-Hungh.”
34.12: Zien nyei, Tin-Hungh zungv maiv zoux waaic sic. Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh maiv aaux baengh fim nyei jauv pien.
34.17: Haaix dauh nzorng baengh fim nyei jauv horpc zuqc gunv nyei fai? Meih oix dingc baengh fim nyei, maaih domh qaqv nyei Tin-Hungh maaih zuiz fai?
34.30: weic bun maiv gan Tin-Hungh nyei mienh maiv duqv gunv, yaac maiv duqv zaeng koux hlopv baeqc fingx.
34.20: Ndaamv muonz nyei ziangh hoc, nduqc dangh hnangv mienh ziouc daic. Baeqc fingx zuqc ndanc dongz, zuqc mietc nzengc mi'aqv. Henv wuov deix zuqc zorqv mingh yaac maiv zeiz baamh mienh nyei buoz zoux.
34.4: Mbuo oix zuqc ginv haaix nyungc se horpc nyei, mbuo ganh oix zuqc dingc haaix nyungc se longx nyei.
34.28: Weic naaiv ninh mbuo bun mienh jomc mienh nyei qiex mingh taux Tin-Hungh wuov. Zuqc kouv heuc nyei mienh nyei qiex, ninh yaac haiz mi'aqv.
34.33: Tin-Hungh oix zuqc ziux meih oix nyei winh bun meih, weic zuqc meih nqemh ninh zoux nyei sic. Meih ganh oix zuqc ginv, maiv zeiz yie. Weic naaiv ziux meih hiuv nyei gunv gorngv aqv.
34.35: “Yopv gorngv waac yaac maiv hiuv haaix nyungc, ninh nyei waac maiv maaih gorn-baengx.
34.19: Ninh maiv mangc domh jien nyei hmien, yaac maiv funx butv-zoih mienh gauh longc jienv mienh jomc mienh, weic zuqc ninh mbuo yietc zungv se Tin-Hungh nyei buoz zeix daaih nyei.
34.34: “Cong-mengh mienh oix gorngv mbuox yie, muangx yie wuov deix mienh guai mienh oix gorngv,
34.18: Tin-Hungh gorngv mbuox hungh diex, ‘Meih se maiv lamh longc,’ yaac gorngv mbuox zoux hlo nyei mienh, ‘Meih se orqv haic.’
34.22: Maiv maaih hmatv jieqv fai mapv hmuangx nyei dorngx bun zoux orqv nyei mienh bingx duqv mbueiz.
34.23: Tin-Hungh zungv maiv zuqc dingc ziangh hoc bun mienh mingh yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien zuqc siemv.
34.13: Haaix dauh orn Tin-Hungh gunv ndau-beih? Fai haaix dauh paaiv ninh gunv gormx lungh ndiev?
34.9: Weic zuqc ninh gorngv, ‘Mienh a'hneiv gan Tin-Hungh haih tengx ninh duqv haaix nyungc longx?’
34.26: Laaix ninh mbuo zoux nyei orqv sic ninh dorng jienv zuangx mienh mborqv ninh mbuo,
34.5: “Yopv gorngv, ‘Yie maiv zoux dorngc, mv baac Tin-Hungh maiv bun yie duqv baengh fim nyei leiz.
34.27: weic zuqc ninh mbuo mingh pien maiv gan ninh, yaac maiv taaih yietc deix ninh nyei doz-leiz.
34.14: Se gorngv Tin-Hungh dingc hnyouv siou ninh bun mienh maaih maengc nyei qiex nzuonx guei ninh ganh,
34.3: weic zuqc m'normh seix waac hnangv mbietc seix nyanc hopv nyei mueix.
34.7: Maaih haaix laanh mienh hnangv Yopv diev duqv mienh huotv ndongc hopv wuom hec.
34.36: Feix duqv bun Yopv zuqc seix taux ndiev. Weic zuqc ninh dau nyei waac hnangv orqv mienh nor.
34.10: “Weic naaiv meih mbuo mienh guai mienh aah! Muangx yie maah! Tin-Hungh za'gengh! maiv haih zoux orqv sic. Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh zungv maiv haih zoux dorngc.
34.2: “Meih mbuo cong-mengh nyei mienh aah! Muangx yie nyei waac maah! Meih mbuo maaih wuonh zaang nyei mienh, tov baeng m'normh muangx yie,
34.31: “Se gorngv maaih dauh mienh gorngv mbuox Tin-Hungh ‘Yie zuqc mborqv njaaux liuz, yiem naaiv mingh yie maiv zoux dorngc.
34.6: Maiv gunv yie zoux duqv horpc, yie zuqc funx benx gorngv-baeqc nyei mienh. Maiv gunv yie maiv maaih zuiz, yie zuqc mun, zorc maiv haih longx.’
34.8: Ninh caux orqv mienh zoux doic, yaac caux mienh waaic mienh juangc jauv yangh.
34.24: Ninh mborqv baaic maaih qaqv nyei mienh yaac maiv zuqc zaah naaic ndaangc. Ninh aengx liepc ganh deix mienh div ninh mbuo.
34.25: Hnangv naaic, ninh hiuv duqv ninh mbuo zoux nyei sic ziouc lungh muonz zanc tuix ninh mbuo nyei weic mietc nzengc mi'aqv.
34.29: Se gorngv ninh sekv nzieqc, haaix dauh haih dingc ninh maaih zuiz? Ninh buang jienv ninh nyei hmien, haaix dauh haih mangc duqv buatc ninh? Maiv gunv ninh zoux bun yietc guoqv fai yietc laanh mienh, zungv fih hnangv nyei,
34.11: Ninh ziux mienh zoux nyei winh bun ninh mbuo, bun mienh duqv puix ninh mbuo zoux nyei jauv.
34.32: Yie mangc maiv buatc nyei tov meih njaaux yie. Se gorngv yie zoux zuiz, yiem naaiv mingh yie maiv zoux aqv.’
34.16: “Se gorngv meih mengh baeqc, muangx yie nyei waac maah! Tov muangx yie gorngv.

18.21: Orqv mienh yiem nyei dorngx zungv hnangv naaiv. Maiv hiuv Tin-Hungh nyei mienh yaac hnangv naaiv aqv.”
18.15: Dongh maiv zeiz ninh nyei ga'naaiv yiem ninh nyei ndopv-liuh, yaac maaih hungh hiaamx jienv ninh yiem nyei dorngx.
18.18: Ninh yiem njang zuqc zunc bieqc hmuangx gu'nyuoz, se zuqc zunc cuotv yaangh gen.
18.12: Laaix ngorc, ninh nyei qaqv piex jienv njiec. Zeqc naanc yiem ninh nyei ga'hlen zuov jienv ninh.
18.13: Ninh nyei ndopv butv ciouv nyei baengc huv nzengc. Doqc haic nyei wuon-baengc naqv ninh nyei buoz-zaux.
18.19: Yiem ninh nyei douh zong maiv maaih ninh nyei hoz doic zeiv-fun. Ninh yiem jiex nyei dorngx maiv maaih yietc dauh cuotv singx maengc.
18.5: “Orqv mienh nyei njang zungv zuqc hnangv dang nor daic mi'aqv. Ninh nyei douz-mbietc yaac maiv ziux njang.
18.20: Fai bung mienh muangx haiz ninh nyei setv mueiz zuqc nyei sic ziouc hnyouv waaic nzengc. Dong bung mienh yaac gamh nziex haic aqv.
18.11: Haeqv ninh gamh nziex haic nyei sic weih jienv biei bung, yaac zunc jienv ninh nyei zaux-nqo mingh.
18.14: Yiem ninh kaux nyei ndopv-liuh ninh zuqc baeng cuotv, aengx zuqc dorh mingh taux gamh nziex haic nyei hungh diex.
18.3: Weic haaix diuc funx yie mbuo hnangv saeng-kuv? Ziux meih mangc, yie mbuo benx ga'naaiv-hngongx fai?
18.10: Maaih hlaang weic ninh bingx jienv ga'ndiev ndau, zaeng jienv yiem ninh yangh nyei jauv.
18.2: “Meih oix gorngv naaiv gorngv wuov ndongc haaix lauh? Hnamv longx maah! Yie mbuo ziouc caux meih gorngv waac.
18.4: Meih qiex jiez hoic ganh mun nyei mienh aah! Ndau-beih laaix meih oix zuqc guangc benx ndau-huaang fai? La'bieiv oix zuqc suiv nqoi ninh nyei dorngx fai?
18.6: Yiem ninh nyei ndopv-liuh nyei njang benx hmuangx, yiem ninh gu'nguaaic nyei dang yaac daic mi'aqv.
18.8: Ninh ganh nyei zaux dorh ninh mingh zuqc mungz nzenc, ninh yangh zaeng hlaang nyei kuotv jiex.
18.9: Hlaang ziouc hlopv jienv ninh nyei zaux-nqo, aengx naeqc jienv zietc nyei.
18.7: Ninh henv nyei zaux-mbiec ih zanc laamx duqv nangv. Ninh ganh daav nyei za'eix zungv hoic ninh ndiqv zuqc ndorpc.
18.17: Yiem lungh ndiev maiv maaih haaix dauh jangx ninh, yiem deic-bung ninh nyei mbuox zutc mi'aqv.
18.16: Ninh nyei nzungh nqaai mingh, ninh nyei nquaah nyaux nzengc.

22.21: “Yopv aac, meih oix zuqc caux Tin-Hungh zoux horpc, caux ninh baengh orn, Tin-Hungh ziouc bun meih duqv longx.
22.15: “Meih corc oix gan loz-jauv fai? Naaiv se orqv mienh yangh jiex nyei jauv.
22.12: “Tin-Hungh maiv zeiz yiem gu'nguaaic lungh hlang nyei dorngx fai? Mangc hlang jiex nyei hleix, ninh mbuo ndongc haaix hlang!
22.17: Ninh mbuo gorngv mbuox Tin-Hungh, ‘Leih nqoi yie mbuo maah!’ yaac gorngv, ‘Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh haih zoux haaix nyungc bun yie mbuo?’
22.30: Liemh zoux dorngc nyei mienh ninh yaac oix njoux. Se gorngv meih zoux duqv horpc meih ziouc duqv njoux.”
22.20: gorngv, ‘Mbuo nyei win-wangv ndongc haaix zungv zuqc pai guangc. Ninh mbuo zengc njiec nyei ga'naaiv zuqc douz buov qui nzengc.’
22.4: “Se weic zuqc meih taaih ninh, ninh cingx gorngv meih yaac siemv meih nyei zuiz fai?
22.28: Meih dingc hnyouv zoux haaix nyungc, meih ziouc haih zoux duqv cuotv nyei. Njang yaac oix ziux meih nyei jauv.
22.19: “Kuv mienh buatc ninh mbuo zuqc baaic ziouc a'hneiv, maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh yaac kuh jatv
22.18: Mv baac Tin-Hungh corc bun longx nyei ga'naaiv buangv nzengc ninh mbuo nyei biauv. Orqv mienh hnamv nyei jauv yie yaac maiv haih mengh baeqc.
22.22: Oix zuqc zipv ninh nyei nzuih njaaux nyei waac, siou ninh nyei waac yiem meih nyei hnyouv gu'nyuoz.
22.23: Se gorngv meih nzuonx daaih lorz Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh meih ziouc duqv ceix jiez hnangv loz wuov nor. Se gorngv meih guangc orqv sic leih meih nyei ndopv-liuh go,
22.13: Meih corc gorngv, ‘Tin-Hungh hiuv duqv haaix nyungc? Ndongc naaic hmuangx, Tin-Hungh hnangv haaix nor haih mangc duqv tong siemv zuiz?
22.9: Meih zunc auv-guaav kungx-buoz baeqc zaux nyei nzuonx yaac zoux doqc guh hanh fu'jueiv.
22.26: hnangv naaiv meih ziouc a'hneiv Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh yaac cau hmien lorz Tin-Hungh.
22.5: Se meih zoux nyei orqv sic hlo haic maiv zeiz? Meih zoux nyei zuiz yaac maiv maaih jomc nyei dorngx.
22.27: Meih ziouc daux gaux jouh ninh, ninh yaac oix muangx meih. Meih yaac jaauv sung meih laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
22.14: Mbuonx-hoz om jienv ninh, ninh ziouc mangc maiv buatc. Ninh yaac youh lungh gu'nguaaic.’
22.3: Se gorngv meih zoux kuv mienh, haih zoux bun Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh a'hneiv fai? Fai se gorngv meih zoux dunh yunh nyei mienh, haih bun Tin-Hungh duqv haaix nyungc?
22.7: Kouv nyei mienh meih maiv bun wuom ninh mbuo hopv, hnyouv sie nyei mienh meih yaac maiv bun hnaangx nyanc.
22.10: Weic naaiv maaih mungz zaeng weih gormx meih. Meih jangx maiv zaaic nyei ziangh hoc liemh zeih zuqc gamh nziex nyei sic.
22.2: “Mienh haih weic Tin-Hungh maaih lamh longc nyei fai? Cong-mengh mienh weic ninh maaih lamh longc nyei fai?
22.6: Meih aapv gorx-youz an dorngx-daauh yaac maiv maaih gorn-baengx. Zungv zorqv nzengc ninh mbuo nyei lui-houx bun ninh mbuo laengh gaengv nyei yiem.
22.8: Meih longc meih nyei hatc maaz duqv lingh deic, maaih mengh dauh nyei mienh duqv yiem naaic.
22.24: se gorngv meih zorqv jiem guangc jienv nie-mbung, zorqv Ofi nyei zien jiem guangc wuov ndoqv-zuonx nyei la'bieiv-qangx,
22.25: se gorngv Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh benx meih nyei jiem, yaac benx meih jaaix haic nyei nyaanh,
22.29: Weic zuqc Tin-Hungh zatv jienv zoux maux nyei mienh, mv baac njoux nyiemc ganh zoux faix nyei mienh.
22.11: Hmuangx om jienv meih, meih ziouc mangc maiv buatc, wuom yaac yiemx jienv meih.
22.16: Maiv gaengh taux daic nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo zuqc zorqv mingh mi'aqv. Ninh mbuo nyei gorn-ndoqv zuqc wuom guaatv mingh.

23.15: Weic naaiv yie yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien gamh nziex sin-zinx. Yie hnamv taux ninh yie ziouc gamh nziex haic.
23.12: Yie maiv simv ninh nyei nzuih hatc nyei waac. Yie funx yiem ninh nyei nzuih cuotv nyei waac gauh jaaix jiex yie qiemx longc nyei nyanc hopv.
23.13: “Tin-Hungh yietc liuz maiv goiv yienc. Maaih haaix dauh haih tiuv ninh nyei za'eix? Ninh oix zoux nyei ninh ziouc zoux.
23.5: Yie oix hiuv duqv ninh hnangv haaix nor dau yie, yaac oix mengh baeqc ninh caux yie gorngv nyei waac.
23.11: Yie nyei zaux yangh nitv jienv ninh nyei zaux-mbiec mingh. Yie gan jienv ninh nyei jauv, yaac maiv mingh pien.
23.14: Ninh weic yie dingc nyei za'eix oix zoux ziangx, ninh corc maaih naaiv nyungc za'eix camv nyei.
23.3: Feix duqv yie haih hiuv mingh haaix ndau lorz ninh, feix duqv yie haih mingh taux ninh yiem nyei dorngx.
23.10: Mv baac ninh hiuv duqv yie yangh nyei jauv. Ninh seix liuz yie, yie ziouc hnangv jiem nor.
23.2: “Ih hnoi yie corc ngaengc jienv ngopv Tin-Hungh, maiv gunv yie njunh jienv yiem, ninh nyei buoz zatv jienv yie.
23.4: Yie ziouc yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien sux yie nyei sic. Yie oix gorngv nzengc yie nyei diuh diuh jauv.
23.6: Tin-Hungh oix longc ninh nyei domh qaqv caux yie nzaeng fai? Maiv zeiz! Ninh zungv oix muangx yie gorngv nyei waac.
23.8: “Yie mingh dong bung lorz Tin-Hungh mv baac ninh maiv yiem naaic. Mingh fai bung, mv baac maiv buatc ninh.
23.9: Ninh yiem baqv bung zoux gong nyei ziangh hoc yie mangc maiv buatc ninh. Yie huin mingh naamh bung mv baac maiv duqv buatc ninh.
23.7: Yiem ninh wuov, hnyouv zingx nyei mienh haih caux ninh nzaeng leiz, siemv zuiz jien ziouc dingc yie yietc liuz maiv dorngc.
23.17: weic zuqc hmuangx weih gormx yie, mapv maengh mapv hmuangx nyei buang jienv yie nyei hmien.
23.16: Tin-Hungh bun yie hnyouv mau. Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh bun yie gamh nziex haic aqv,

13.21: Tov hluotv meih nyei buoz leih go yie, yaac tov maiv dungx zoux gamh nziex nyei sic haeqv yie.
13.15: Maiv gunv ninh daix yie, yie corc maaih lamh hnamv, mv baac yie yaac oix yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien biux mengh yie nyei jauv.
13.12: Meih mbuo nyei waac-puix hnangv saaiv maiv lamh longc, meih mbuo luonx nyei leiz ndongc wuom-bamc mau nor.
13.17: “Tov longx-longx nyei muangx yie gorngv nyei waac, yaac bun yie sux nyei waac bieqc meih nyei m'normh.
13.20: “Kungx tov bun i nyungc yie hnangv, yie ziouc maiv bingx meih nyei hmien.
13.4: Meih mbuo longc gorngv-baeqc nyei waac nzaatv jienv meih mbuo maiv hiuv nyei. Meih mbuo se hnangv maiv lamh longc nyei ndie-sai.
13.28: “Mienh gunv zoux gunv zitc hnangv ga'naaiv-huv, hnangv zuqc gaeng ngaatc waaic nyei lui-houx.
13.19: Maaih haaix dauh oix gox yie? Maaih nor, yie ziouc sekv yaac daic.
13.18: Yie liuc leiz ziangx yie nyei sic aqv. Yie hiuv duqv zungv biux mengh yie maiv dorngc.
13.22: Tin-Hungh aac, gunv heuc, yie ziouc dau. Fai bun yie gorngv, meih yaac dau yie.
13.23: Yie nyei zuiz caux zoux dorngc nyei sic maaih mbu'ziex? Tov bun yie hiuv duqv yie zoux dorngc nyei jauv caux yie baamz nyei zuiz.
13.13: “Tov meih mbuo sekv dangh maah! Yie oix gorngv. Nqa'haav maiv gunv benx haaix nyungc, sueih yie benx aqv.
13.9: Se gorngv ninh zaah mangc meih mbuo, meih mbuo haih duqv longx fai? Meih mbuo haih nduov Tin-Hungh hnangv mienh nduov mienh fai?
13.26: Meih fiev jienv hniev haic nyei sic gox yie, aengx bun yie ndaam-dorng yie lunx nyei ziangh hoc zoux nyei zuiz.
13.5: Feix duqv meih mbuo sekv nzieqc nyei. Naaiv ziouc benx meih mbuo nyei cong-mengh aqv.
13.27: Meih zorqv ndiangx gapc jienv yie nyei zaux, aengx mangc jienv yie nyei diuh diuh jauv meih yaac dingc ziangx yie nyei zaux-benv caaiv duqv taux nyei dorngx.
13.14: Maiv gunv hnangv haaix nor yie oix zoux aqv, yie maiv funx maengc nyei gorngv.
13.3: Mv baac yie oix caux Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh gorngv waac, yie oix caux Tin-Hungh luonx leiz.
13.7: Meih mbuo oix weic Tin-Hungh gorngv jaav nyei waac fai? Meih mbuo oix weic ninh gorngv-baeqc?
13.10: Se gorngv meih mbuo bingx jienv tengx yietc bung, ninh ndongc haaix zungv oix gorngv-hemx meih mbuo.
13.2: Meih mbuo hiuv nyei, yie yaac hiuv. Yie maiv gauh aiv meih mbuo.
13.1: “Naaiv deix yietc zungv sic yie nyei m'zing duqv buatc jiex, yie nyei m'normh duqv haiz jiex yaac mengh baeqc.
13.6: “Ih zanc tov muangx yie luonx nyei jauv yaac muangx yie sux nyei waac.
13.8: Meih mbuo oix tengx Tin-Hungh wuov bung nzaeng fai? Meih mbuo oix weic ninh luonx leiz?
13.24: “Meih weic haaix diuc bingx meih nyei hmien, yaac funx yie zoux meih nyei win-wangv?
13.25: Meih oix haeqv yietc kuaaiv zuqc nziaaux buonc nyei ndiangx-normh yaac zunc mbiauh nqaauv nqaai fai?
13.11: Ninh nyei haangh daauh bun meih gamh nziex, zungv haeqv meih mbuo mau nzengc saah?
13.16: Naaiv oix benx yie nyei njoux en, weic zuqc maiv taaih Tin-Hungh nyei mienh maiv duqv mingh yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien.

9.21: “Yie maiv maaih dorngx nqemh, mv baac yie maiv gunv ganh aqv. Yie youx haic yie nyei maengc.
9.15: Maiv gunv yie maiv zoux dorngc, yie yaac maiv haih dau ninh. Yie oix zuqc tov siemv yie wuov dauh korv-lienh yie.
9.12: Ninh zorqv ninh oix longc nyei, maiv maaih haaix dauh haih laanh ninh. Haaix dauh gaamv naaic ninh, ‘Meih zoux haaix nyungc?’
9.17: Ninh longc domh nziaaux buonc mborqv yie, bun yie zuqc mun nyei dorngx camv jienv faaux yaac maiv maaih gorn-baengx.
9.30: Se gorngv yie longc sorng nzaaux sin, longc nzie nyei wuom nzaaux buoz,
9.20: Maiv gunv yie maiv dorngc, yie ganh nyei nzuih oix dingc yie maaih zuiz. Maiv gunv yie maiv maaih dorngx nqemh, ninh oix bun cing yie dorngc.
9.4: Tin-Hungh nyei hnyouv maaih cong-mengh, ninh nyei qaqv yaac henv. Haaix dauh haih ngaengc Tin-Hungh yaac ngaengc duqv hingh?
9.28: yie ziouc gamh nziex yie nyei yietc zungv kouv naanc, weic zuqc yie hiuv duqv meih maiv funx yie maiv maaih dorngc nyei dorngx.
9.33: Feix duqv maaih dauh yiem yie mbuo mbu'ndongx tengx muangx, yaac haih tengx yie mbuo i bung dunx sic.
9.35: Wuov nyungc yie ziouc gorngv waac yaac maiv gamh nziex ninh, weic zuqc yie hiuv duqv yie nyei hnyouv maiv hnangv naaic.
9.19: Se gorngv saaix qaqv, mangc maah! Ninh ndongc haaix henv! Se gorngv weic siemv zuiz nyei jauv, haaix dauh haih heuc ninh daaih?
9.34: Tov Tin-Hungh zorqv nqoi ninh nyei biaav maiv mborqv yie, yaac tov maiv dungx zoux gamh nziex nyei sic haeqv yie.
9.18: Ninh zungv maiv bun yie tauv qiex, daaux nzuonx bun yie nyei maengc kouv taux ndiev.
9.22: Yietc zungv fih hnangv nzengc. Weic naaiv yie gorngv, maiv gunv maiv maaih dorngx nqemh nyei mienh caux orqv mienh, ninh mietc nzengc mi'aqv.
9.23: Mienh zuqc zeqc naanc liemh zeih daic, Tin-Hungh jatv maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh buangh nyei zeqc naanc.
9.13: Tin-Hungh maiv bun ninh nyei ga'qiex fiu, ninh bun tengx Laa^hapc wuov deix zuqc yiem ninh nyei zaux-ndiev.
9.9: Ninh zeix Ba'dauv Hleix caux Siec Muoz-Sieqv Hleix, Faam-Cing Hleix caux naamh bung nyei hleix.
9.26: Yie nyei hnoi jiex siepv hnangv siepv haic nyei nzangv nor, hnangv domh jaangv njiec siepv zorqv ga'naaiv nyanc.
9.5: “Ninh qiex jiez wuov zanc, ninh zorqv mbong mbienv nzuonx daaih. Ninh suiv mbong, mbong zungv maiv hiuv.
9.27: Se gorngv yie gorngv, ‘Yie oix la'kuqv yie ngopv nyei sic, yie oix guangc nqoi hmien nzauh nyei jauv, zoux njien-youh aqv,’
9.14: “Wuov nyungc yie hnangv haaix nor haih dau ninh? Yie hnangv haaix nor haih ginv waac caux ninh luonx?
9.3: Se gorngv haaix dauh maaih hnyouv oix caux ninh nzaeng, ninh gorngv yietc cin nzunc, mienh yaac maiv haih dau yietc nzunc.
9.7: Ninh hatc mba'hnoi, mba'hnoi ziouc maiv cuotv, ninh aengx buang jienv zuangx hleix.
9.10: Ninh zoux hlo haic nyei sic jiex ndaangc yie mbuo haih mengh baeqc, zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic zungv saauv maiv hingh.
9.2: “Yie za'gengh hiuv duqv se hnangv naaic. Mv baac mienh hnangv haaix nor haih yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien benx zoux duqv horpc nyei mienh?
9.31: mv baac meih zoi yie ndortv kuotv, liemh yie nyei lui-houx oix youx yie.
9.6: Tin-Hungh nqamv baamh gen dongz cuotv ninh nyei dorngx, ndau nyei ndiouh yaac dongz nzengc.
9.8: Ninh ganh nduqc dauh corng lungh, yaac caaiv koiv nyei wuom-laangc.
9.24: Tin-Hungh zorqv baamh gen jiu bun yiem orqv mienh nyei buoz-ndiev. Ninh buang jienv baamh gen siemv zuiz mienh nyei hmien. Se gorngv maiv zeiz ninh, benx haaix dauh?
9.25: “Yie nyei hnoi-nyieqc jiex siepv hnangv saaix tiux nyei mienh tiux nor. Yie nyei hnoi liemh zeih jiex mi'aqv, yaac maiv buatc haaix nyungc longx.
9.29: Yie zungv zuqc dingc zuiz. Wuov nyungc yie weic haaix diuc baeqc baeqc zoux kouv?
9.11: Tin-Hungh yangh yie nyei ga'hlen jiex, yie yaac mangc maiv buatc. Ninh yangh nza'hmien maengx jiex, yie yaac maiv hiuv.
9.32: “Tin-Hungh maiv zeiz baamh mienh hnangv yie nor, yie ziouc maiv haih caux ninh zoux sic.
9.16: Se gorngv yie heuc ninh, ninh yaac dau yie, yie zungv maiv sienx ninh muangx yie nyei qiex.

40.21: Ninh bueix njiec ndiangx-njimv ga'ndiev, yiem njaangh nyei luoqc diqc lomc gu'nyuoz.
40.15: “Mangc Mbe^he^motv maah! Yie zeix ninh hnangv yie zeix meih. Ninh nyanc miev hnangv ngongh nor.
40.12: Mangc dauh dauh ceng-hlo nyei mienh yaac baeng ninh mbuo ndortv njiec, zorqv orqv mienh caaiv njiec ninh mbuo yiem nyei dorngx.
40.17: Ninh bun ninh nyei dueiv ngaengc hnangv si^ndaa zongh ndiangx, ninh nyei camh zuih nyei jaan ciqv jienv jaax.
40.20: Zuangx mbong cuotv nyanc nyei ga'naaiv bun ninh, benx yietc zungv hieh zoih nziaauc nyei dorngx.
40.4: “Ziouv  aac, yie se ziangh maiv benx haaix nyungc mienh, yie hnangv haaix nor haih dau meih? Yie zungv longc buoz buang jienv nzuih.
40.19: Ninh se Tin-Hungh zeix daaih nyei da'yietv dauh, kungx Zeix Ninh Daaih Wuov Dauh haih hingh ninh.
40.18: Ninh nyei mbungv hnangv dongh siqv ndongh, ninh nyei buoz-zaux hnangv hlieqv-biaav.
40.22: Weic zuqc ndiangx-njimv tengx ninh bingx laangh, ndoqv-hlen nyei suiv-liemh ndiangx weih gormx ninh.
40.23: Maiv gunv wuom seix, ninh maiv gamh nziex, maiv gunv Jor^ndaen Ndaaih nyei wuom congx zuqc ninh nyei nzuih baengx, ninh yaac maiv huaang.
40.13: Zorqv ninh mbuo yietc zungv biopv jienv nie-mbung, yaac ndoh ninh mbuo yiem yiemh gen.
40.9: Meih maaih buoz hnangv Tin-Hungh nyei buoz henv fai? Meih maaih qiex ndomh ndomh nyei mbui hnangv ninh nyei qiex mbui fai?
40.5: Yie gorngv nzunc liuz, yie ziouc maiv dau, gorngv i nzunc, yie ziouc maiv aengx jaa gorngv aqv.”
40.14: Hnangv naaic yie ziouc nyiemc bun meih, meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz haih njoux duqv ganh.
40.3: Yopv ziouc dau Ziouv.  Ninh gorngv,
40.7: “Meih oix zuqc liuc leiz ziangx hnangv jun-zeiv mienh nor. Yie oix naaic meih, meih oix zuqc dau yie.
40.10: Wuov nyungc, oix zuqc longc njang-laangc zorng nzueic, yaac longc njang-laangc nyei haangh daauh dorngx lui zuqv.
40.2: “Yopv aah! Daanh nyei mienh oix caux Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh nzaeng nyei fai? Caux Tin-Hungh nzaeng nyei mienh dau ninh maah!”
40.6: Wuov zanc Ziouv yiem nziaaux-zunc dau Yopv nyei waac. Ninh gorngv,
40.8: “Meih oix bun cing yie maiv baengh fim fai? Meih oix dingc yie zoux dorngc weic bun meih ganh horpc fai?
40.24: Haaix dauh haih buang jienv ninh nyei m'zing zorqv ninh? Haaix dauh haih zorqv ninh aengx cunx tong ninh nyei mba'zorng?
40.11: Zoux maux nyei mienh meih qiex jiez, nouz haic, gunv zatv ninh mbuo njiec aiv.
40.16: Ninh nyei qaqv yiem ninh nyei jaaiv, ninh nyei ga'sie nyei orv yaac maaih qaqv henv.

26.12: Ninh longc ninh nyei qaqv bun koiv sekv, yaac longc ninh nyei wuonh zaang mborqv hingh Laa^hapc.
26.13: Ninh bun ninh nyei nziaaux buonc lungh nzang, ninh longc ninh nyei buoz nzopv daic siepv nyei domh naang.
26.5: “Yiem yiemh gen nyei mienh, se yiem wuom-ndiev caux wuom gu'nyuoz nyei mienh nyanh nyanh nyei.
26.11: Ninh hemx lungh nyei ndiouh, ninh mbuo ziouc gamh nziex nyanh nyanh nyei.
26.14: Mv baac naaiv se gorngv deix baav Tin-Hungh nyei jauv-louc. Yie mbuo kungx haiz diqv dien waac-sapv gorngv taux ninh hnangv. Mv baac ninh nyei domh qaqv mbui hnangv mba'ong nor, haaix dauh haih bieqc hnyouv?”
26.3: Meih tengx maiv maaih cong-mengh nyei mienh caangh laangh duqv longx haic, yaac bun cing meih maaih hlo haic nyei wuonh zaang orqc?
26.10: Ninh yiem wuom-minc guetv huing gormx, yiem njang caux hmuangx gapv nyei dorngx.
26.2: “Meih gengh! tengx yie, dongh maiv maaih qaqv nyei mienh orqc? Meih gengh njoux duqv mau haic nyei mienh orqc?
26.4: Haaix dauh tengx meih gorngv cuotv naaiv deix waac? Maaih haaix dauh dongz zuqc meih hnangv naaiv nor gorngv?
26.6: Yiemh gen yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien buatc duqv nqaengc nyei, zuqc mietc nyei dorngx maiv maaih haaix nyungc torngv.
26.8: Ninh beu wuom yiem buangv mbuonx-hoz gu'nyuoz, wuom yaac maiv zoux bun mbuonx mbaaix.
26.9: Ninh bun mbuonx torngv jienv ninh nyei weic, zorqv ninh nyei mbuonx corng daaih buang jienv.
26.7: Tin-Hungh zorqv baqv bung nyei lungh corng kungx nyei dorngx gu'nguaaic, yaac zorqv baamh gen kuangx jienv maiv maaih haaix nyungc nyei dorngx.

41.21: Ninh biomv qiex bun douz-taanx zieqc, ninh nyei nzuih cuotv douz-mbietc.
41.15: Ninh nyei diqc daanz nyei jiex benx yietc liouz yietc liouz hnangv torngv-baaih nor, nitv jienv jaax maqc nyei, gapv jienv ndipc nyei hnangv la'bieiv nor ngaengc.
41.12: “Yie yaac maiv nyienz jienv maiv gorngv taux ninh nyei buoz-zaux, fai ninh nyei domh qaqv fai ninh nyei sin liouc.
41.17: Jiex gitv jienv jaax, yietc kuaaiv lapv yietc kuaaiv, maiv haih maeqv maiv nqoi.
41.30: Ga'sie ndoqv nyei jiex laic hnangv nie-mor huv. Ninh luih jienv gan wuom-bamc jiex hnangv nyueih mbiauh nyei jaa-sic.
41.20: Ninh nyei mba'zorng cuotv douz-sioux, hnangv caeng mbueix caux zieqc jienv nyei luoqc diqc guaengv nor.
41.4: Ninh oix caux meih liepc ngaengc waac, laengz yietc liuz zoux meih nyei nouh?
41.28: Forng haeqv maiv duqv ninh biaux, bungx la'bieiv nyei ndopv-hlaang weic ninh dorngx mbiauh nqaauv gorn.
41.33: Yiem lungh ndiev maiv maaih haaix nyungc hnangv ninh. Ninh benx zeix cuotv nyei ga'naaiv, yaac maiv gamh nziex haaix nyungc.
41.19: Ninh nyei nzuih cuotv douz hnangv douz-baav, yaac maaih douz-fing ndaix cuotv.
41.34: Ninh mangc nyungc-nyungc yiem hlang nyei ga'naaiv. Ninh zoux zuangx hieh zoih nyei hungh.”
41.18: Ninh ciuv ziouc maaih njang njapc dangh cuotv daaih. Ninh nyei m'zing hnangv lungh ndorm nziouv nyei njang-laangc.
41.22: Ninh nyei jaang za'gengh henv haic, da'faanh buangh ninh wuov deix gamh nziex! haic.
41.23: Ninh nyei orv-nziu ciqv jienv jaax zietc nyei, ngaengc nyei, hnangv dox daaih nyei hlieqv nor, nqamv maiv dongz.
41.13: Haaix dauh haih ciev ninh nyei ga'nyiec wuov yiemc lui? Haaix dauh haih nzopv bieqc ninh nyei i yiemc hlieqv-lui?
41.9: Mienh maaih lamh hnamv oix zorqv ninh mv baac maiv zeiz aqv, daan buatc ninh hnangv, daamv mapv aqv, king njiec ndau.
41.26: Maiv gunv longc nzuqc ndaauv nzopv, yaac hoic maiv zuqc ninh, liemh nzopv nyei cang caux biu nyei cang yaac hoic maiv zuqc ninh.
41.5: Meih haih zorqv ninh dorngx norqc longc a'nziaauc, fai ndoh jienv hlaang ken nduov meih nyei sieqv-lunx a'hneiv fai?
41.27: Weic ninh nor, hlieqv dorngx mbiauh nqaauv, dongh siqv dorngx ndiangx-latv.
41.14: Haaix dauh haih maeqv nqoi ninh nyei nzuih baengx? Huing gormx ninh nyei nzuih nyei nyaah haeqv mienh gamh nziex haic.
41.3: Ninh oix qaqv tov meih korv-lienh nyei fai? Ninh oix longc suonc nyei waac caux meih gorngv?
41.7: Meih haih longc cang-fou cunx ninh nyei ndopv, fai longc nzopv mbiauz cang nzopv ninh nyei m'nqorngv fai?
41.10: Maiv maaih haaix dauh ciouv gaux cuoqv ninh. Wuov nyungc, haaix dauh haih yiem yie nyei nza'hmien souv duqv wuonv?
41.2: Meih haih longc hlaang cunx ninh nyei mba'zorng, fai longc ngau kuangx ninh nyei haah baah fai?
41.1: “Yopv aah! Meih haih longc diux zorqv Le^wi^aa^taan, fai longc hlaang ndoh ninh nyei mbietc fai?
41.31: Ninh bun ndo nyei wuom mbueix hnangv caeng mbueix, bun koiv hnangv caeng gu'nyuoz nyei ndie-youh.
41.6: Zorqv mbiauz mienh dorh ninh daaih gorngv jaax-zinh, saeng-eix mienh ziouc zorqv ninh bun nqoi fai?
41.8: Longc meih nyei buoz muoqv ninh, haaix zanc jangx zuqc meih caux ninh mborqv jaax, meih yietc liuz maiv aengx zoux aqv.
41.24: Ninh nyei hnyouv ngaengc hnangv la'bieiv, hnangv ga'ndiev maengx morc.
41.25: Ninh jiez sin, mienh henv mienh gamh nziex, ninh zoux ciouv, ninh mbuo hnyouv waaic nzengc.
41.29: Ndiangx-ndonx dorngx mbiauh nqaauv gorn, ninh yaac jatv biu cang nyei qiex mbui.
41.11: Maaih haaix dauh bun haaix nyungc yie, dongh yie oix zuqc winh bun ninh? Lungh ndiev nyei maanc muotc yietc zungv se yie nyei.
41.32: Ninh jiex mingh nyei jauv nqa'haav maengx cuotv njang njapc njapc nyei, mienh ziouc hnamv daaih koiv ndo nyei dorngx maaih mba'biei baeqc.
41.16: Naaiv deix jiex yietc kuaaiv gapv yietc kuaaiv ndipc haic, qiex zungv maiv haih jiex mbu'ndongx-qangx.

5.21: Ninh beu jienv meih, maiv bun zuqc gorngv waac-huv nyei mienh hoic. Zuqc mietc nyei ziangh hoc taux, meih yaac maiv gamh nziex.
5.15: Mv baac Tin-Hungh njoux mienh jomc mienh biaux ndutv, maiv zuqc mienh zeix. Bun dangx-donx nyei mienh biaux ndutv mienh henv mienh nyei buoz.
5.12: Ninh porx waaic guv guaix mienh daav nyei za'eix, ninh mbuo nyei buoz ziouc zoux maiv cuotv haaix nyungc.
5.17: “Tin-Hungh gorngv-njaaux nyei mienh maaih orn-lorqc. Weic naaiv maiv dungx mangc piex Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh mborqv njaaux
5.20: Ngorc hnaangx nyei ziangh hoc, ninh njoux meih biaux ndutv, maiv zuqc daic. Mborqv jaax nyei ziangh hoc ninh njoux biaux ndutv nzuqc ndaauv nyei qaqv.
5.4: Ninh nyei dorn sieqv lorz maiv duqv baengh orn nyei dorngx, yiem zingh gaengh ndaangc ninh mbuo zuqc zeix, yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh njoux.
5.19: Ninh oix njoux meih biaux ndutv juqv nzunc zeqc naanc, taux siec nzunc zeqc naanc, maiv maaih haaix nyungc hoic meih.
5.18: weic zuqc Tin-Hungh bun zuqc mun, mv baac ninh beu jienv, ninh mborqv, mv baac ninh nyei buoz zorc longx.
5.22: Meih buangh zuqc mietc nyei sic caux ngorc hnaangx meih ziouc kuh jatv. Meih yaac maiv gamh nziex ndau-beih nyei hieh zoih.
5.23: Weic zuqc meih zoux nyei ndeic zungv maiv maaih la'bieiv, yiem ndeic nyei hieh zoih yaac oix caux meih horpc.
5.13: Ninh bun cong-mengh mienh zuqc ninh mbuo ganh nyei za'eix hlopv ninh mbuo, yaac bun guv guaix mienh nyei za'eix siepv-siepv nyei zuqc mietc.
5.9: Ninh zoux hlo nyei sic zungv hnamv maiv zaaic, yaac zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic zungv saauv maiv hingh.
5.26: Meih nyei siouc nyuonh ndaauv, hnyangx-jeiv gox meih cingx taux zouv, hnangv mbiauh zeiv taux ziangh hoc siou.”
5.5: Ninh siou nyei gaeng-zuangx zuqc hnyouv sie nyei mienh nyanc, liemh ziangh jienv njimv gu'nyuoz yaac zorqv nzengc. Ngorc nqaatv nyei mienh hungh hungh hae-hae nyei oix duqv ninh nyei zinh zoih.
5.27: “Naaiv deix yietc zungv yie mbuo longx-longx nyei zaah mangc liuz aqv. Muangx maah! Oix zuqc hiuv duqv se weic tengx meih duqv longx.”
5.14: Yiem lungh hnoi zanc ninh mbuo buangh zuqc hmuangx, lungh aanx zanc huaax naaiv huaax wuov hnangv lungh muonz zanc nor.
5.3: Yie buatc hngongx nyei mienh liepc wuonv hnangv njiec nzungh nor, mv baac yie liemh zeih zioux ninh yiem nyei dorngx.
5.7: Mv baac mienh cuotv seix zungv zuqc buangh kuonx naanh hnangv douz-fing ndaix faaux.
5.10: Ninh bun mbiungc njiec ndau-beih, bun wuom yungz liangx-ndeic.
5.2: Qiex jiez nyei jauv haih daix daic hngongx nyei mienh, mueic jieqv nyei sic yaac daix daic hnamv maiv hiuv haaix nyungc nyei mienh.
5.1: “Yopv aah! Ih zanc gunv heuc maah! Maaih haaix dauh dau meih? Meih haih lorz haaix dauh fin-mienh tengx?
5.6: Zeqc naanc maiv zeiz yiem nie-mbung cuotv, kuonx naanh maiv zeiz yiem ndau-ndiev butv cuotv daaih.
5.8: “Se gorngv yie nor, yie oix lorz Tin-Hungh, oix zorqv yie nyei sic jiu bun ninh.
5.24: Meih ziouc hiuv duqv meih nyei ndopv-liuh yiem longx nyei. Meih zaah mangc meih nyei ba'gi yungh laanh yaac buatc maiv caa haaix nyungc.
5.25: Meih zungv oix hiuv duqv meih nyei fun-faqv oix hiaangx camv, meih nyei zeiv-fun yaac ndongc ndau-beih nyei miev.
5.11: Ninh zorqv zoux faix nyei mienh bouh faaux hlang, yaac bun nzauh nyiemv nyei mienh duqv yiem longx.
5.16: Hnangv naaic mienh jomc mienh maaih lamh hnamv dorngx, maiv baengh fim nyei mienh yaac nqapc jienv nzuih.

27.21: Dong bung nyei nziaaux hlorv ninh mingh, ninh ziouc mingh mi'aqv. Nziaaux guaatv ninh mingh leih nqoi ninh nyei dorngx.
27.15: Ninh zengc njiec nyei mienh zungv zuqc wuon-baengc daic, ninh mbuo nyei auv-guaav yaac maiv nyiemv.
27.12: Naaiv meih mbuo yietc zungv buatc jiex. Wuov nyungc meih mbuo weic haaix diuc gorngv cuotv maiv lamh longc nyei waac?
27.17: maiv gunv ninh ndui jienv, mv baac kuv mienh duqv zuqv, maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh duqv bun nqoi ninh nyei nyaanh.
27.20: Ninh zuqc gamh nziex haic nyei sic hnangv wuom yiemx nor. Lungh muonz zanc nziaaux-zunc hlorv ninh mingh mi'aqv.
27.4: yie nyei nzuih meix zungv maiv gorngv jaav nyei waac, yie nyei mbietc yietc liuz maiv gorngv-baeqc.
27.19: Ninh bueix njiec nyei ziangh hoc ninh butv zoih nyei, mv baac jiex mingh maiv duqv hnangv naaic, ninh nungx nqoi m'zing, maiv buatc nzengc ninh nyei zinh zoih mi'aqv.
27.18: Orqv mienh zoux biauv hnangv gaeng-nyorc mbiorngz, hnangv siouv gaeng mienh zoux nyei liuh.
27.22: Nziaaux zorqv ninh zoi mingh yaac maiv korv-lienh. Ninh njiec qaqv biaux nziaaux nyei qaqv.
27.23: Mienh mbaix buoz haav-haav nyei jatv, zunc ninh cuotv ninh nyei loz-dorngx.
27.13: “Naaiv se Tin-Hungh bun orqv mienh duqv nyei buonc, se Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh bun zeix mienh wuov deix nzipc nyei buonc.
27.9: Ninh zuqc zeqc naanc nyei ziangh hoc, Tin-Hungh oix muangx ninh tov nyei waac fai?
27.5: Yie ndongc haaix zungv maiv gorngv meih mbuo horpc, taux yie daic yie corc ngaengc jienv gorngv yie maiv zoux dorngc.
27.14: Maiv gunv ninh nyei fu'jueiv hiaangx camv, se weic bun zuqc nzuqc ndaauv daix. Ninh nyei fun-faqv yaac yietc liuz maiv duqv nyanc beuv.
27.3: da'faanh yie corc maaih qiex tauv, yaac maaih Tin-Hungh nyei qiex yiem yie nyei mba'zorng,
27.7: “Tov bun yie nyei win-wangv hnangv orqv mienh nor, yaac bun caux yie doix-dekc wuov deix hnangv maiv baengh fim nyei mienh.
27.10: Ninh ziouc a'hneiv Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh fai? Ninh oix zanc-zanc heuc Tin-Hungh fai?
27.2: “Yie ziangv jienv yietc liuz ziangh nyei Tin-Hungh, dongh maiv bun yie duqv baengh fim nyei leiz, se ziangv jienv Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh, dongh bun yie hnyouv mun wuov dauh, houv waac,
27.1: Yopv aengx borqv jienv gorngv ninh nyei jauv-louc. Ninh gorngv,
27.6: Yie ngaengc jienv gorngv yie zoux duqv horpc, maiv bungx guangc. Da'faanh yie yiem seix zaangc nyei hnoi-nyieqc, yie nyei hnyouv maiv nqemh yie ganh.
27.8: Maiv taaih Tin-Hungh nyei mienh zuqc Tin-Hungh pai guangc, se zorqv ninh nyei maengc nyei ziangh hoc, ninh maaih haaix nyungc maaih lamh hnamv?
27.11: “Yie oix njaaux meih mbuo hiuv duqv Tin-Hungh nyei qaqv ndongc haaix hlo, Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh nyei za'eix yie yaac maiv bingx.
27.16: Maiv gunv orqv mienh zornc nyaanh ndui jienv hnangv nie-mbung, maaih lui-houx camv zungv zuqv maiv hingh,

38.21: Meih za'gengh hiuv nyei, weic zuqc zeix baamh gen wuov zanc meih zungv cuotv seix daaih aqv. Meih yiem nyei hnoi-nyieqc gengh camv haic.
38.15: Orqv mienh nyei njang zuqc zorqv nqoi, ziouc dangv jienv maiv bun ninh mbuo zoux doqc nyei sic.
38.37: Haaix dauh maaih cong-mengh saauv mbuonx? Fai haaix dauh haih dox cuotv lungh nyei wuom-ongx,
38.12: “Yopv aac, yiem meih nyei seix zeiv meih duqv hatc jiex lungh ndorm, yaac bun lungh ndorm nziouv hiuv duqv ninh nyei dorngx,
38.17: Maaih haaix dauh bun meih hiuv duqv zuqc daic nyei gaengh? Yiemh gen hmuangx nyei dorngx nyei gaengh meih buatc jiex nyei fai?
38.30: Wuom ngaengc mingh hnangv la'bieiv, koiv nyei wuom-minc yaac gitv benx sorng.
38.20: Meih haih dorh ninh mingh taux ninh nyei dorngx, weic bun meih hiuv duqv mingh ninh nyei biauv wuov diuh jauv fai?
38.4: “Yie liepc baamh gen nyei gorn-ndoqv wuov zanc, meih yiem haaix? Se gorngv meih hiuv, mbuox yie maah!
38.28: Mbiungc maaih die nyei fai? Fai haaix dauh yungz mbiungc-suiv ndiepv?
38.33: Meih hiuv duqv lungh nyei leiz-latc fai? Meih haih bun naaiv deix leiz-latc gunv lungh ndiev fai?
38.35: Meih haih paaiv mba'lingc njiec, mba'lingc ziouc mbuox meih, ‘Yie mbuo yiem naaiv’?
38.19: “Njang yiem nyei dorngx yangh haaix mingh? Hmuangx yiem nyei dorngx yiem haaix?
38.34: “Meih haih heuc mbuonx duih mbiungc njiec yiemx jienv meih fai?
38.18: Meih hiuv duqv ndau-beih ndongc haaix jangv fai? Meih hiuv duqv naaiv deix yietc zungv nor, gorngv mbuox yie maah!
38.22: “Meih bieqc jiex sorng nyei lamz, fai buatc jiex borqc nyei lamz fai?
38.23: Yie liouh jienv sorng caux borqc weic zeqc naanc nyei ziangh hoc, weic mborqv jaax caux mborqv domh jaax nyei hnoi.
38.13: weic bun ninh haih ziux jomc lungh gorn, yaac zunc orqv mienh cuotv ninh bingx nyei dorngx?
38.9: Se yie longc mbuonx buang jienv koiv, yaac longc hmuangx hoz beu jienv ninh.
38.40: “Sienh mbaapv jienv yiem ninh mbuo nyei kuotv fai yiem mbueiz nyei dorngx zuov, meih haih lorz ga'naaiv bun nyanc, fai bun sienh lunx duqv nyanc beuv?
38.26: Haaix dauh bun mbiungc duih njiec maiv maaih mienh yiem nyei ndau, caux maiv maaih mienh yiem nyei deic-bung-huaang?
38.41: Norqc aa laaix maiv maaih ga'naaiv nyanc jiex naaiv jiex wuov, ninh nyei dorn heuc tov Tin-Hungh tengx. Haaix dauh lorz ga'naaiv bun norqc aa nyanc?
38.5: Haaix dauh dingc ndau lomh haaix hlo? Daaix meih hiuv nyei saah? Haaix dauh baeng hlaang ndorqc?
38.27: Haaix dauh bun ndau-huaang ndau-nqaai duqv wuom gaux weic yungz ndau cuotv miev-maeng?
38.38: bun nie-mbung gitv benx ndunh, nie-ndunh yaac gitv jienv jaax?
38.14: Ndau-beih goiv yienc hnangv mborqv jienv yienx nyei ba'naih nie, maanc muotc hinc cuotv mengh nyei hnangv lui-houx nor.
38.3: Meih oix zuqc liuc leiz ziangx hnangv dauh jun-zeiv mienh. Yie oix naaic meih, meih yaac oix zuqc dau yie.
38.7: Wuov zanc lungh ndorm nyei hleix lomh nzoih baaux nzung, zuangx fin-mienh njien-youh nyei heuc.
38.36: Haaix dauh bun mienh nyei hnyouv maaih cong-mengh, yaac bun hnyouv maaih wuonh zaang?
38.10: Yie dingc koiv nyei gapv-jaaix, an jienv gaengh caux gaengh sorn,
38.2: “Naaiv dongh haaix dauh longc maiv maaih wuonh zaang nyei waac bun yie nyei za'eix muangh mingh?
38.1: Wuov zanc Ziouv yiem nziaaux-zunc dau Yopv nyei waac. Ninh gorngv,
38.31: “Meih haih zorqv Siec Muoz-Sieqv Hleix ndoh jienv, fai jaiv nqoi Faam-Cing Hleix nyei hlaang fai?
38.6: Ndau nyei gorn-ndoqv liepc yiem haaix nyungc gu'nguaaic? Haaix dauh an baamh gen nyei gorqv gauh longc jienv jiex wuov norm la'bieiv?
38.8: “Koiv nyei wuom baetv cuotv hnangv gu'nguaaz cuotv maa nyei ga'sie wuov zanc, haaix dauh guon gaengh dangv jienv koiv?
38.24: Mingh taux njang bun nqoi nyei dorngx yiem haaix? Fai mingh taux dong bung nyei nziaaux bun nzaanx buangv ndau-beih nyei dorngx yiem haaix?
38.25: “Haaix dauh weic domh mbiungc wetv wuom-zuonx, yaac koi jauv bun mba'lingc douz?
38.29: Haaix dauh zoux sorng nyei maa? Lungh zaangc nyei mbiungc-suiv gitv, haaix dauh yungz daaih?
38.11: yaac gorngv, ‘Meih daaih taux naaiv hnangv, maiv dungx jiex ndaangc, meih henv haic nyei wuom-laangc oix zuqc dingh njiec naaiv.’
38.32: Meih haih dorh hleix-guanh ziux ninh mbuo nyei gueix, fai dorh Ba'dauv Hleix caux gan ninh nyei hleix fai?
38.16: “Meih bieqc jiex taux koiv nyei nyuonh, fai yangh jiex koiv-ndoqv ndo jiex nyei dorngx fai?

14.21: Ninh nyei dorn mbuo duqv mienh taaih, ninh yaac maiv hiuv. Ninh mbuo ndortv njiec aiv, ninh yaac maiv buatc.
14.15: Meih oix heuc, yie ziouc dau meih. Meih oix a'hneiv duqv buatc meih nyei buoz zoux daaih nyei ga'naaiv.
14.12: mienh daic mingh maiv aengx nangh daaih, taux lungh jiex nzengc ninh maiv nyie, nqamv ninh, ninh yaac maiv haih nyie.
14.17: Yie zoux dorngc nyei sic meih dapv jienv mbuoqc aengx mborqv jienv yienx. Meih yaac buang jienv yie nyei zuiz.
14.20: Meih yietc liuz hingh jiex mienh, ninh ziouc guei seix mi'aqv. Meih tiuv ninh nyei hmien yaac bun ninh mingh mi'aqv.
14.4: Haaix dauh haih dorh cing-nzengc nyei ga'naaiv yiem maiv cing-nzengc nyei ga'naaiv cuotv? Maiv maaih yietc dauh.
14.19: Wuom congx la'bieiv, la'bieiv ziouc jie nzengc, domh mbiungc yaac guaatv ndau-beih nyei nie mingh. Meih fih hnangv nyei mietc baamh mienh maaih lamh hnamv nyei dorngx.
14.18: “Mv baac mbong mbaang huv mi'aqv. La'bieiv-zorng yaac suiv nqoi leih ninh nyei dorngx.
14.22: Ninh kungx haiz ninh ganh nyei sin zaangc mun, yaac weic ninh ganh nzauh nyiemv.”
14.13: “Feix duqv meih zorqv yie bingx jienv yiemh gen. Feix duqv meih torngv jienv yie, zuov meih nyei ga'qiex fiu. Feix duqv meih dingc ziangx ziangh hoc weic jangx yie.
14.9: yietv duqv wuom nyei qiex ninh ziouc cuotv cunx, yaac cuotv nquaah hnangv ndiangx-lunx nor.
14.5: Ninh ziangh nyei hnoi-nyieqc jaa-ndaangc dingc ziangx aqv, ninh nyei hlaax-soux se yiem meih dingc. Meih dingc ziangx ninh ziangh nyei soux mouc, ninh yaac maiv haih jiex ndaangc.
14.14: Se gorngv mienh daic mingh, ninh aengx haih nangh daaih fai? Yie zuov jienv naaiv deix yietc zungv nyei hnoi-nyieqc jiex, taux yie duqv bungx nqoi nyei ziangh hoc.
14.3: Hnangv yie naaiv nyungc mienh meih bungx m'zing mangc jienv ninh aengx dorh ninh daaih yiem meih nyei nza'hmien zuqc siemv fai?
14.7: “Se gorngv ndiangx zuqc goix, corc maaih lamh hnamv haih cuotv cunx. Cunx yaac ndaauv jienv mingh, maiv dingh aqv.
14.10: Mv baac mienh daic, bueix jienv zaqc nyei. Ninh dangx qiex ninh ziouc yiem haaix?
14.2: Ninh cuotv daaih hnangv biangh nor, yaac ziec mi'aqv. Ninh hnangv dongh linh nor jiex, maiv yiem aqv.
14.1: “Mienh yiem m'sieqv dorn cuotv seix nyei hnoi-nyieqc zoqc nyei, kungx maaih kuonx naanh buangv nzengc.
14.6: Tov huin ganh bung, maiv dungx mangc ninh weic bun ninh duqv henh, bun ninh a'hneiv hnangv maaic gong mienh jiex yietc norm hnoi.
14.8: Maiv gunv ninh nyei nzungh yiem ndau-ndiev gox, ninh nyei gorn yiem ndau daic,
14.11: Hnangv koiv nyei wuom nqaai, ndaaih nyei wuom haapv yaac nqaai,
14.16: Taux wuov zanc meih oix saauv yie nyei zaux-mbiec, mv baac meih maiv zuov jienv zorqv yie zoux dorngc nyei zuiz.

3.21: Ninh mbuo zuov jienv daic, mv baac maiv duqv daic. Ninh mbuo lorz daic nyei jauv gauh camv lorz bingx jienv nyei zinh zoih.
3.15: fai caux zoux hlo nyei mienh yiem, dongh bun ninh mbuo nyei biauv maaih jiem nyaanh buangv.
3.12: Weic haaix diuc maaih cingh mborqc zipv yie? Fai maa bun ninh nyei nyorx yie hopv?
3.17: Yiem naaic orqv mienh dingh njiec, maiv zoux orqv, kouv nyei mienh duqv hitv kuonx.
