3.20: “Weic haaix diuc ceix njang bun zuqc siouc kouv nyei mienh? Weic haaix diuc bun nzauh kouv nyei mienh maaih maengc ziangh?
3.4: Tov bun wuov hnoi hmuangx mingh. Tov bun gu'nguaaic nyei Tin-Hungh maiv lorz wuov norm hnoi, yaac maiv dungx bun njang ziux zuqc.
3.19: Hlo-hlo faix-faix nyei mienh yiem naaic, zoux nouh nyei mienh biaux ndutv ninh nyei ziouv.
3.18: Yiem wuov zuqc wuonx nyei mienh duqv lomh nzoih henh, muangx maiv haiz aapv ninh mbuo zoux gong wuov deix nyei qiex mbui.
3.22: Ninh mbuo zuov jienv daic bieqc zouv ziouc a'hneiv, za'gengh! njien-youh taux daauh.
3.23: Tin-Hungh bingx jienv mienh hoz nqaang nyei jauv, bung-bung weih jienv ninh mbuo.
3.13: Maiv hnangv naaic yie duqv bueix njiec sekv zieqc. Yie daic ziouc duqv hitv kuonx,
3.9: Tov bun wuov ndorm nyei Taaix-Baeqc Fing hmuangx mingh, bun wuov muonz hnamv jienv haih njang mv baac maiv njang, maiv duqv buatc lungh ndorm nziouv nyei njang,
3.26: Yie maiv maaih baengh orn, yaac maiv duqv sekv. Yie maiv duqv hitv kuonx, mv baac kouv naanc daaih lorz yie.”
3.5: Tov bun wuov hnoi mapv maengh mapv hmuangx, bun mbuonx-hoz torngv jienv, tov bun wuov norm hnoi mapv maengh nyei ziouc hingh nzengc njang.
3.14: caux lungh ndiev nyei hungh diex caux caangh laangh nyei mienh yiem, dongh weic ganh ceix jiez ih zanc mbaang waaic nyei dorngx,
3.3: “Tov bun yie cuotv seix nyei hnoi caux ninh mbuo gorngv, ‘Maaih gu'nguaaz-dorn cuotv seix’ wuov muonz zuqc mietc.
3.7: Tov bun wuov muonz maiv maaih saeng-yungz, bun wuov muonz nyei ziangh hoc yaac maiv haiz njien-youh heuc nyei qiex mbui.
3.10: weic zuqc wuov muonz bun yie cuotv seix bun yie zuqc ziex nyungc kouv naanc hoic.
3.1: Nqa'haav Yopv nqoi nzuih zioux ninh nyei cuotv seix hnoi.
3.6: Tov bun wuov muonz mapv maengh mapv hmuangx nyei, zorqv nqoi, maiv dungx bun hnyangx maaih wuov norm hnoi, yaac maiv dungx bun wuov norm hnoi bieqc hlaax nyei soux mouc.
3.8: Tov bun haih zioux hnoi nyei mienh zioux wuov hnoi, se maaih banh zeic dongz Le^wi^aa^taan jiez daaih wuov deix.
3.24: Yie tauv qiex-ndoqc dorngx nyanc hnaangx, yie njunh nyei qiex dox cuotv hnangv wuom nor.
3.25: Weic zuqc yie gamh nziex nyei sic zungv zuqc yie mi'aqv. Dongh yie gamh nziex jiex nyei sic ndortv zuqc yie.
3.11: “Yie cuotv seix wuov zanc, yie weic haaix diuc maiv daic? Yie cuotv maa nyei ga'sie, weic haaix diuc maiv dangx qiex?
3.16: Fai yie weic haaix diuc maiv hnangv mbaang waaic nyei gu'nguaaz biopv jienv, se hnangv maiv buatc jiex njang nyei gu'nguaaz.

7.21: Meih weic haaix diuc maiv guangc yie dorngc nyei dorngx, yaac zorqv nqoi yie nyei zuiz? Weic zuqc maiv lauh yie oix bueix nie-mbung gu'nyuoz. Meih oix lorz yie mv baac yie maiv yiem aqv.”
7.15: Weic naaiv yie oix ginv goh jaang daic gauh longx yiem jienv yie naaiv norm sin.
7.18: Meih ndorm-ndorm mingh zaah mangc ninh, mouz buon ziangh hoc yaac kauv ninh.
7.12: Yie zoux koiv fai koiv nyei domh mbiauz meih cingx oix zuqc bun mienh zuov jienv yie?
7.13: Yie gorngv, ‘Yie nyei coux haih tengx yie kuh yiem. Yie bueix nyei dorngx haih jaiv deix yie nyei kouv naanc.’
7.19: Aengx ndongc haaix lauh meih cingx huin ganh bung maiv mangc yie, fai bungx yie ganh yiem taux haih duqv naqv aax yie nyei wuom-nzuih?
7.5: Yie nyei sin butv gaeng buangv nzengc, nie-mbung yaac dorngx lui zuqv. Yie nyei ndopv butv faang, aengx nzaeqv, butv nongc.
7.20: Mangc mienh nyei Tin-Hungh aah? Se gorngv yie baamz zuiz yie hnangv haaix nor hoic zuqc meih? Meih weic haaix diuc zorqv yie dorngx meih nyei forng-cang nyei mbaeqc? Yie weic haaix diuc benx meih oix zuqc ndaam hniev nyei ga'naaiv?
7.11: “Weic naaiv yie ziouc maiv nqapc yie nyei nzuih, yie nyei hnyouv mun jienv oix gorngv aqv. Yie hnyouv kouv haic ziouc oix zuqc gorngv.
7.14: Mv baac meih bun yie mbeix buatc haeqv yie, longc hinc yaangh nyei sic bun yie gamh nziex haic.
7.3: Fih hnangv nyei, yie hlaax jiex hlaax ziangh jienv maiv lamh longc, yaac muonz jiex muonz zuqc diev kouv.
7.10: Ninh maiv aengx nzuonx ganh nyei biauv. Ninh yiem nyei dorngx nyei mienh yaac la'kuqv ninh mi'aqv.
7.2: hnangv nouh za'gengh oix lorz dorngx bingx laangh, hnangv maaic gong nyei mienh zuov ninh nyei gong-zinh.
7.1: “Baamh mienh yiem lungh ndiev kungx zuqc zoux kouv, ninh nyei hnoi-nyieqc hnangv zuqc maaic gong nyei mienh,
7.4: Yie bueix njiec nyei ziangh hoc, yie gorngv, ‘Yie taux haaix zanc cingx duqv jiez sin?’ Mv baac lungh muonz zanc ndaauv haic. Yie kungx mbienv mingh mbienv daaih, noic maiv duqv lungh njang.
7.6: “Yie nyei hnoi-nyieqc gauh siepv nzenc suix ndatv ndie nyei biaav, taux setv mueiz yaac maiv lamh hnamv dorngx aqv.
7.8: Ih zanc mangc jienv yie wuov dauh nyei m'zing maiv duqv aengx buatc yie. Meih oix lorz yie, mv baac yie maiv yiem aqv.
7.9: “Hnangv mbuonx nzaanx mitc nzengc, mienh njiec yiemh gen maiv haih aengx faaux daaih.
7.7: O Tin-Hungh aac, tov jangx jienv oc, yie nyei maengc se hnangv tauv yietc nzunc qiex. Yie nyei m'zing maiv duqv aengx buatc longx nyei jauv.
7.17: “Baamh mienh benx haaix nyungc meih cingx funx longc jienv yaac hietv hnyouv ninh?
7.16: Yie youx yie nyei maengc, maiv oix yietc liuz ziangh. Bungx yie, sueih yie ganh yiem, weic zuqc yie nyei hnoi-nyieqc kungx hnangv tauv yietc nzunc qiex.

39.21: Ninh yiem wuov horngz nyaaiv ndau, yaac a'hneiv ninh nyei qaqv, ninh cuotv mingh buangh dorh jienv wuoqc ginc nyei baeng.
39.15: Ninh maiv hnamv taux haih zuqc zaux caaiv huv, fai hieh zoih haih caaiv waaic.
39.12: Meih bungx hnyouv ninh dorh meih nyei laangh ziqc nzuonx daaih? Yaac siou meih nyei mbiauh taux mborqv mbiauh nyei ciangv?
39.17: weic zuqc Tin-Hungh maiv bun ninh maaih cong-mengh, yaac maiv bun ninh haih bieqc hnyouv.
39.30: Ninh nyei dorn sorqv nziaamv, zuqc daix nyei mienh nyei sei yiem haaix, domh jaangv-ngongh yaac yiem wuov.”
39.20: Meih bun ninh biu hnangv jopv-nyeic, bun ninh tauv qiex mbui haeqv mienh gamh nziex?
39.4: Ninh mbuo nyei dorn henv jienv faaux, yiem lomc-huaang hlo daaih. Ninh mbuo guangc maa mingh yaac maiv nzuonx.
39.28: Ninh yiem hlang jiex nyei mbaengx zoux ninh nyei biauv, bangc mbaengx-ningv zoux ninh wuonv nyei dorngx.
39.19: “Yopv aac, se meih bun maaz henv fai? Se meih bun maaz nyei jaang maaih nzong ndaauv fai?
39.18: Mv baac ninh yang jienv ndaatv tiux wuov zanc, ninh jatv maaz caux geh maaz nyei mienh.
39.22: Ninh jatv gamh nziex nyei sic, ninh ganh maiv gamh nziex, buatc nzuqc ndaauv, ninh yaac maiv tuix nzuonx.
39.23: Geh maaz mienh buix nyei forng-ndongh saev-saev nyei mbui, yaac maaih cang-ndaauv cang-nangv njapc njapc nyei.
39.13: “Norqc lorh torh njien-youh nyei yaapv ndaatv, mv baac sin nyei biei caux ndaatv nyei biei beiv maiv taux norqc nyieh nyei.
39.9: “Hieh ngongh kangv fu-sux meih fai? Ninh oix yiem meih nyei miev-zoh ga'hlen bueix jiex muonz fai?
39.26: “Domh jaangv yang ndaatv ndaix, hungx jienv naamh bung mingh, naaiv se bangc meih nyei cong-mengh zoux fai?
39.5: “Haaix dauh bungx hieh lorh? Haaix dauh jaiv ninh nyei hlaang?
39.27: Se meih paaiv domh jaangv ndaix faaux, yiem hlang nyei dorngx zoux lauz fai?
39.14: Norqc lorh torh ndauc jaux guangc wuov ndau, bun ndau tengx ninh nyei jaux siouv.
39.3: Meih hiuv duqv ninh mbuo haaix zanc mbaapv njiec, bun ninh mbuo nyei dorn ndortv ndau fai?
39.7: Ninh jatv zingh coh coh nyei qiex, maiv haiz zunc saeng-kuv nyei mienh heuc nyei qiex mbui.
39.10: Meih haih longc hlaang ndoh jienv hieh ngongh laih ndau fai? Ninh oix gan meih baah yuonh komv nyei dorngx fai?
39.2: Ninh maaih jienv dorn nyei hlaax-nyieqc meih haih saauv nyei fai? Haaix zanc njiec dorn meih hiuv nyei?
39.1: “La'bieiv-mbaengx nyei hieh yungh haaix zanc njiec dorn, meih hiuv nyei fai? Njaih nyeiz njiec dorn meih buatc jiex nyei?
39.6: Yie zorqv ndau-huaang benx ninh nyei biauv, bun ndau-nzaaih benx ninh yiem nyei dorngx.
39.8: Ninh youh gormx mbong benx ninh nyei miev-ciangv, ninh qaqv lorz nyungc-nyungc miev-maeng nyanc.
39.24: Ninh ciouv-ciouv nyei nyaaiv ndau yaac tiux jienv mingh, yietv haiz jorng nyei qiex mbui ninh souv dingc maiv duqv aqv.
39.25: Jorng nyei qiex haaix zanc mbui ninh heuc, ‘Haev haev,’ ninh yiem go nyei hnomv zuqc mborqv jaax nyei qiex, yaac haiz jun-baeng-bieiv caux heuc nyei qiex mbui.
39.29: Yiem naaiv ninh mangc jienv zorqv ga'naaiv nyanc, ninh nyei m'zing mangc duqv buatc go nyei.
39.11: Weic zuqc ninh maaih qaqv henv meih haih kaux ninh fai? Meih zorqv meih nyei gong-hniev jiu bun ninh zoux?
39.16: Ninh zoux doqc bun ninh nyei dorn, hnangv maiv zeiz benx ninh ganh nyei dorn nor. Maiv gunv ninh ndortv qaqv, ninh yaac maiv korv-fiqv,

36.21: Faix fim, maiv dungx huin mingh lorz zuiz nyei jauv, weic zuqc meih ginv zuiz gauh camv ginv longc kouv naanc.
36.15: Tin-Hungh longc siouc kouv nyei jauv njoux siouc kouv nyei mienh. Ninh longc zuqc zeix nyei sic koi nqoi ninh mbuo nyei m'normh.
36.12: Mv baac se gorngv ninh mbuo maiv muangx, ninh mbuo ziouc zuqc nzuqc ndaauv daix, ninh mbuo daic yaac maiv hiuv haaix nyungc.
36.17: Mv baac meih zungv zuqc dingc zuiz hnangv orqv mienh, meih yaac biaux maiv ndutv baengh fim nyei zuqc siemv dingc zuiz nyei jauv.
36.30: Ninh bun mba'lingc faatv nzaanx ziux gormx ninh ganh, yaac torngv jienv koiv-ndoqv.
36.20: Maiv dungx hnamv oix buatc lungh muonz zanc taux, se maanc fingx mienh yiem ninh mbuo nyei dorngx zuqc pai guangc nyei ziangh hoc.
36.4: Za'gengh zien nyei, yie nyei waac maiv jaav, maaih wuonh zaang dunh yunh wuov dauh caux meih yiem.
36.28: lungh ziouc duih njiec, camv-camv nyei bun maanc mienh.
36.33: Mba'ong mbui nyei qiex biux mengh ninh zoux nyei sic, saeng-kuv yaac hiuv duqv domh mbiungc-nziaaux oix taux.
36.19: Meih heuc jienv tov nyei haih tengx meih biaux ndutv kouv naanc fai? Meih ganh nyei yietc zungv qaqv haih tengx duqv meih nyei fai?
36.18: Faix fim oc. Maiv dungx bun zinh zoih yuoqc meih mingh dorngc jauv, yaac maiv dungx bun nyaanh hmuangx camv nduov meih mingh pien.
36.22: “Jangx jienv Tin-Hungh nyei qaqv ndongc haaix hlo! Maiv maaih haaix dauh zoux fin-saeng hnangv ninh.
36.23: Haaix dauh paaiv Tin-Hungh zoux nyei jauv? Haaix dauh haih gorngv mbuox ninh, ‘Meih zoux maiv horpc’?
36.13: “Maiv maaih hnyouv taaih Tin-Hungh nyei mienh zanc-zanc qiex jiez. Ninh mbuo zuqc dingc zuiz, ninh mbuo maiv heuc jienv tov tengx.
36.9: Tin-Hungh bun ninh mbuo hiuv duqv ninh mbuo zoux nyei sic, caux ninh mbuo nyei zuiz, se bun ninh mbuo hiuv duqv ninh mbuo zoux maux.
36.26: “Tin-Hungh za'gengh hlo, mbuo hiuv maiv nzengc. Mbuo maiv haih funx maiv taux ninh nyei hnyangx-soux.
36.5: “Tin-Hungh se henv haic yaac maiv mangc piex haaix dauh, maiv maaih haaix nyungc ninh maiv hiuv.
36.27: Ninh baeng wuom-ndiepv faaux, bun mouc gapv zunv benx mbiungc,
36.14: Lunx nyei ziangh hoc ninh mbuo daic mi'aqv. Ninh mbuo nyei setv mueiz nyei maengc zuqc nyaiv.
36.3: Yie oix zorqv yie hiuv nyei jauv yiem go nyei dorngx daaih, yie oix gorngv mengh Zeix Yie Daaih Wuov Dauh se baengh fim nyei.
36.7: Ninh zanc-zanc mangc jienv kuv mienh, liepc ninh mbuo zueiz weic hnangv hungh diex, bun ninh mbuo yietc liuz duqv mienh taaih.
36.10: Ninh bun ninh mbuo nyei m'normh muangx duqv haiz ninh njaaux nyei waac, yaac hatc ninh mbuo guangc nqoi orqv nyei jauv.
36.2: “Tov aengx diev jienv muangx yie gorngv diqv dien, yie ziouc bun meih hiuv, weic zuqc yie corc maaih waac tengx Tin-Hungh gorngv.
36.31: Weic zuqc ninh longc naaiv deix siemv maanc fingx, yaac ceix bungx-zuoqc nyei laangh ziqc bun ninh mbuo.
36.6: Ninh maiv bun orqv mienh duqv ziangh jienv, mv baac ninh bun zuqc kouv nyei mienh duqv baengh fim.
36.8: Se gorngv ninh mbuo zuqc limc ndoh jienv yaac zuqc siouc kouv nyei hlaang nzenc jienv,
36.24: Meih oix zuqc jangx jienv ceng ninh zoux nyei sic se hlo haic, dongh mienh baaux nzung ceng nyei sic.
36.25: Maanc mienh duqv buatc ninh zoux nyei sic, baamh mienh yiem go nyei dorngx mangc.
36.29: Maaih haaix dauh mengh baeqc mbuonx hnangv haaix nor mingh mingh daaih daaih, fai yiem Tin-Hungh yiem nyei dorngx mba'ong hnangv haaix nor mbui?
36.11: Se gorngv ninh mbuo muangx Tin-Hungh yaac fu-sux ninh, ninh mbuo duqv bungx-zuoqc nyei ziangh jienv yiem buangv ninh mbuo nyei hnoi-nyieqc, duqv orn-lorqc nyei yiem buangv ninh mbuo nyei hnyangx-daauh.
36.32: Ninh longc mba'lingc buang jienv ninh nyei buoz, yaac hatc mba'ong piqv ninh dingc daaih nyei dorngx.
36.16: “Tin-Hungh yienz meih cuotv kuonx naanh nyei jauv, bun meih yiem jangv nyei dorngx, maiv maaih haaix nyungc laanh, bun mbenc jienv buangv meih nyei dieh wuov deix nyanc hopv maaih kuv nyei mueix doc.

10.21: ndaangc yie mingh maiv nzuonx nyei dorngx, se mingh yiemh gen, mapv hmuangx nyei deic-bung.
10.15: Se gorngv yie zoux orqv, yie zuqc kouv aqv. Se gorngv yie zoux horpc, yie cau maiv jiez m'nqorngv. Yie za'gengh! nyaiv nzengc, yaac mangc jienv yie ganh nyei kouv naanc.
10.12: Meih bun yie maaih maengc ziangh yaac ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie. Meih yaac longx-longx nyei beu jienv yie nyei maengc.
10.17: Meih aengx jaa liepc zorng-zengx mienh daaih gox yie, yaac jaa qiex jiez yie. Meih dorh siang-jun-baeng tiuv jienv mborqv yie.
10.20: Yie ziangh seix nyei hnoi-nyieqc zoqc haic maiv zeiz? Tov bungx yie ganh yiem, bun yie duqv deix njien-youh
10.4: Meih nyei m'zing hnangv baamh mienh nyei m'zing fai? Meih buatc hnangv baamh mienh buatc fai?
10.19: ziouc hnangv maiv maaih jiex yie, se yiem maa nyei ga'sie mingh taux zouv mi'aqv.
10.18: “Tin-Hungh aah! Meih weic haaix diuc dorh yie cuotv maa nyei ga'sie? Feix duqv yie daic ndaangc mienh nyei m'zing buatc yie,
10.22: Naaiv norm deic-bung se hmuangx haic, lunc nzengc, yiem wuov nyei njang yaac hmuangx mi'aqv.”
10.13: “Mv baac naaiv deix sic meih bingx jienv yiem hnyouv, yie yaac hiuv duqv naaiv se meih nyei za'eix aqv.
10.9: Tov jangx jienv meih longc ba'naih nie zeix yie, meih corc oix bun yie nzuonx benx nie-mbung fai?
10.5: Meih nyei hnoi hnangv baamh mienh nyei hnoi fai? Meih nyei hnyangx yaac hnangv mienh nyei hnyangx fai?
10.14: Se gorngv yie baamz zuiz meih mangc jienv yie. Meih zungv oix dingc yie nyei zuiz, maiv bungx guangc.
10.3: Meih zeix mienh aengx mangc piex meih nyei buoz zeix daaih nyei ga'naaiv, yaac ceng orqv mienh nyei za'eix, naaiv deix sic meih haiz horpc nyei fai?
10.7: maiv gunv meih hiuv duqv yie maiv maaih dorngc nyei dorngx, yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh njoux yie biaux ndutv meih nyei buoz-ndiev.
10.10: Meih dox yie cuotv daaih hnangv nyorx, aengx bun yie gitv daaih hnangv nyorx-hmei-ngaengc maiv zeiz?
10.2: Yie oix gorngv mbuox Tin-Hungh, maiv dungx dingc yie maaih zuiz. Tov bun yie hiuv meih weic haaix diuc caux yie nzaeng.
10.1: “Yie youx haic yie nyei maengc, yie ziouc sueih jienv gorngv yie nyei naanc zingh. Yie hnyouv gu'nyuoz kouv ziouc oix gorngv aqv.
10.6: Hnangv naaic meih cingx daaih lorz yie zoux dorngc nyei sic, aengx zimh lorz yie nyei zuiz,
10.8: “Meih nyei buoz nanv yie, zeix yie cuotv daaih, ih zanc meih daaux nqaang daaih oix mietc yie.
10.11: Meih longc ndopv caux orv benx lui bun yie zuqv, yaac longc mbungv caux jaan daaux jienv.
10.16: Se gorngv yie bouh yie ganh faaux, meih zunc yie hnangv sienh zunc nor. Meih aengx zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic hoic yie.

2.12: Ninh mbuo yiem go nyei buatc ninh, mv baac zieqv maiv duqv ninh, ziouc bungx-sing bungx-qiex nyei nyiemv, yaac betv ninh mbuo nyei lui-ndaauv, aengx nyau nie-mbung faatv faaux lungh ndortv njiec ninh mbuo nyei m'nqorngv.
2.13: Ninh mbuo caux Yopv zueiz jienv ndau siec hnoi siec muonz yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh caux ninh gorngv yietc joux waac, weic zuqc ninh mbuo buatc Yopv zuqc nyei zeqc naanc za'gengh hniev haic.
2.5: Mv baac ih zanc sung meih nyei buoz hoic ninh nyei sin, ninh zungv oix yiem meih nyei nza'hmien zioux meih.”
2.11: Yopv nyei buo dauh loz-gaeng doic, se Temaan Zingh nyei mienh, E^li^fatv, caux Quwaa Mienh, Mbin^ndatc, caux Naa^aa^me Mienh, Sofaa, haiz gorngv Yopv zuqc naaiv deix yietc zungv zeqc naanc, gorqv-mienh ziouc yiem gorqv-mienh nyei dorngx daaih gapv jienv doic. Ninh mbuo dunx ziangx doic yietc jauv daaih, weic tengx Yopv jaiv nzauh, orn ninh nyei hnyouv.
2.3: Ziouv  naaic Saadaan, “Meih samx mangc yie nyei bou, Yopv, nyei fai? Yiem lungh ndiev maiv maaih yietc laanh mienh hnangv ninh zoux hnyouv zingx, maiv lamh nqemh dorngx. Ninh taaih Tin-Hungh yaac simv nqoi, maiv zoux haaix nyungc orqv sic. Meih gorngv gau taux yie nqoi nzuih bun meih zoux bun ninh, meih zungv oix mietc ninh yaac maiv maaih gorn-baengx, mv baac ninh corc ziepc zuoqv nyei.”
2.10: Mv baac Yopv dau ninh, “Meih gorngv waac hnangv dauh hngongx nyei m'sieqv dorn gorngv nor. Mbuo yiem Tin-Hungh nyei buoz zipv longx nyei ga'naaiv. Mbuo maiv horpc zuqc zipv maiv benx nyei fai?” Yopv zuqc naaiv deix yietc zungv sic, yiem Yopv gorngv nyei waac ninh maiv baamz zuiz.
2.2: Ziouv  naaic Saadaan, “Meih yiem haaix daaih?” Saadaan dau Ziouv, “Yie youh lungh ndiev mingh mingh daaih daaih faaux-faaux njiec-njiec.”
2.1: Aengx maaih norm hnoi fin-mienh daaih yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien, Saadaan yaac caux jienv ninh mbuo daaih yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien.
2.4: Saadaan dau, “Ndopv div ndopv. Mienh maaih nyei yietc zungv ninh oix longc weic njoux ninh ganh nyei maengc.
2.6: Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Saadaan, “Wuov nyungc, ninh yiem meih nyei buoz-ndiev, mv baac oix zuqc liouh ninh nyei maengc.”
2.8: Ninh ziouc zueiz jienv saaiv-ndui zorqv hlengx nie-mor huv guaaih ganh nyei sin.
2.9: Ninh nyei auv gorngv, “Meih corc ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux? Gunv zioux Tin-Hungh yaac daic aqv maah!”
2.7: Saadaan ziouc yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien cuotv mingh hoic Yopv bun Yopv ziangh doqc haic nyei zueih yiem zaux-ndoqv-nyeiz faaux taux m'nqorngv-baengh.

1.21: yaac gorngv, “Yie njang sin yiem yie nyei maa nyei ga'sie cuotv, yaac oix zuqc njang sin nyei nzuonx.   Ziouv  ceix bun nyei,   Ziouv  aengx siou nzuonx. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv  nyei mengh.”
1.15: Liemh zeih maaih Se^mbaa Mienh daaih zorqv saeng-kuv caangv mingh nzengc, yaac longc nzuqc ndaauv daix nzengc bou. Kungx yie ganh duqv biaux cuotv daaih mbuox meih hnangv.”
1.12: Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Saadaan, “Wuov nyungc, ninh maaih nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv se yiem meih nyei buoz-ndiev. Kungx ninh ganh nyei sin meih maiv dungx hoic.” Saadaan ziouc yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien mingh aqv.
1.17: Ninh corc gorngv jienv waac wuov zanc, aengx maaih ganh dauh daaih gorngv, “Ken^ndie Mienh bun nqoi zoux buo guanh caangv lorh torh dorh mingh nzengc, yaac longc nzuqc ndaauv daix nzengc wuov deix bou. Kungx zengc yie ganh biaux ndutv daaih mbuox meih hnangv.”
1.20: Yopv ziouc jiez sin daaih betv ninh nyei lui, yaac teix ninh nyei m'nqorngv, puoqv njiec ndau baaix
1.4: Jiex daaih nyei ziangh hoc, ninh nyei dorn tiuv jienv yiem ninh mbuo ganh nyei biauv, ziux ninh mbuo nyei hnoi mbenc hnaangx hlo nyei, yaac paaiv mienh mingh heuc ninh mbuo nyei buo dauh muoc daaih caux ninh mbuo nyanc yaac hopv.
1.19: ziouc maaih gorng domh nziaaux-zunc yiem deic-bung-huaang daaih buonc biauv nyei biei norm gorqv. Biauv ziouc mbaang, ndapv zuqc wuov deix mienh lunx mienh daic nzengc mi'aqv. Kungx yie ganh biaux ndutv daaih mbuox meih hnangv.”
1.18: Ninh corc gorngv jienv waac wuov zanc, aengx maaih dauh bou daaih gorngv, “Meih nyei dorn sieqv yiem ninh mbuo nyei domh gorx nyei biauv nyanc hnaangx, hopv a'ngunc diuv,
1.22: Yiem naaiv deix yietc zungv sic, Yopv maiv baamz zuiz yaac maiv guaix Tin-Hungh.
1.13: Maaih hnoi Yopv nyei dorn sieqv yiem ninh mbuo nyei domh gorx nyei biauv nyanc hnaangx, hopv a'ngunc diuv.
1.9: Saadaan dau Ziouv, “Yopv taaih Tin-Hungh se baeqc baeqc taaih nyei fai?
1.5: Mbenc nyanc nyei hnoi-nyieqc jiex liuz, Yopv paaiv mienh mingh heuc ninh nyei dorn mbuo saax nzengc uix. Ninh lungh ndorm jiez sin nziouv nyei, yaac ziux ninh mbuo yietc zungv mienh nyei soux mouc fongc horc buov ziec nyei ga'naaiv. Ninh zanc-zanc hnangv naaic zoux weic zuqc ninh gorngv, “Nziex yie nyei naamh nyouz baamz zuiz, yiem hnyouv zioux Tin-Hungh.”
1.14: Maaih dauh douc fienx mienh daaih mbuox Yopv, “Ngongh laih jienv ndeic, lorh yaac yiem ga'hlen nyanc miev.
1.3: Ninh maaih siec cin dauh ba'gi yungh, buo cin dauh lorh torh, hmz baeqv doix ngongh, hmz baeqv dauh lorh nyeiz, yaac maaih bou camv nyei. Beiv yiem dong bung nyei yietc zungv mienh, naaiv dauh gauh butv zoih jiex.
1.7: Ziouv  naaic Saadaan, “Meih yiem haaix daaih?” Saadaan dau Ziouv, “Yie youh lungh ndiev mingh mingh daaih daaih, faaux-faaux njiec-njiec.”
1.10: Meih beu jienv ninh caux ninh nyei biauv zong mienh, liemh bung-bung ninh maaih nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv maiv zeiz? Meih ceix fuqv ninh nyei buoz zoux nyei gong yaac bun ninh nyei jaa-dingh hiaangx jienv faaux camv.
1.2: Ninh maaih siec dauh dorn, buo dauh sieqv.
1.1: Yiem Utc Deic maaih laanh mienh, mbuox heuc Yopv. Naaiv laanh mienh se hnyouv zingx nyei mienh, maiv maaih dorngx nqemh. Ninh taaih Tin-Hungh, yaac simv nqoi, maiv zoux haaix nyungc orqv sic.
1.6: Maaih hnoi nor, fin-mienh daaih yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien. Saadaan yaac daaih yiem ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx.
1.8: Ziouv  naaic Saadaan, “Meih samx mangc yie nyei bou Yopv nyei fai? Yiem lungh ndiev maiv maaih yietc laanh mienh hnangv ninh zoux hnyouv zingx, maiv lamh nqemh dorngx. Ninh taaih Tin-Hungh yaac simv nqoi, maiv zoux haaix nyungc orqv sic.”
1.11: Mv baac tov sung meih nyei buoz muoqv ninh maaih nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv, ninh ziouc dorng jienv meih zioux meih aqv.”
1.16: Ninh corc gorngv jienv waac wuov zanc, aengx maaih dauh mienh daaih gorngv, “Tin-Hungh nyei douz yiem lungh njiec daaih buov ba'gi yungh guanh caux goux yungh guanh nyei bou qui nzengc. Kungx yie ganh biaux ndutv daaih mbuox meih hnangv.”

31.21: se gorngv yie hiuv duqv yiem zingh gaengh ndaangc nyei sic dorngh maaih mienh tengx yie, yie ziouc sung buoz zeix guh hanh fu'jueiv,
31.15: Zeix yie yiem maa nyei ga'sie wuov dauh fih hnangv nyei zeix ninh maiv zeiz? Yaac dongh naaiv dauh Tin-Hungh bun yie mbuo yiem maa nyei ga'sie zeix daaih maiv zeiz?
31.37: Yie oix gorngv mengh mbuox Tin-Hungh yie zoux nyei yietc zungv, yie ziouc hnangv zoux hlo nyei mienh bieqc taux ninh nyei nza'hmien.
31.12: weic zuqc naaiv nyungc zuiz benx douz buov taux zuqc mietc nyei dorngx, yaac bun yie duqv daaih nyei yietc zungv zuqc buov qui.
31.17: se gorngv yie ganh nyanc yie maaih nyei diqv dien, guh hanh fu'jueiv yaac maiv duqv nyanc,
31.30: (Yie zungv maiv bun yie nyei nzuih baamz zuiz, zioux bun ninh zuqc daic),
31.20: se gorngv yie maiv bun ninh duqv yie nyei ba'gi yungh nyei biei tengx ninh siouv, ninh nyei hnyouv ziouc maiv buang waac bun yie,
31.4: Ninh maiv zeiz mangc yie mingh nyei jauv yaac saauv yie nyei norm-norm zaux-mbiec fai?
31.28: naaiv yaac benx siemv zuiz jien oix zuqc dingc nyei zuiz, weic zuqc yie maiv ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux bun Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh.
31.33: se gorngv yie bingx yie baamz nyei zuiz hnangv Aa^ndam, zorqv zuiz bingx jienv yie nyei hnyouv,
31.35: “O feix duqv maaih dauh muangx yie. (Naaiv yie faaux yie nyei mbuox. Tov Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh dau yie.) Tov gox yie wuov dauh zorqv gox nyei waac fiev jienv.
31.19: se gorngv yie buatc haaix dauh daic laaix maiv maaih lui-houx zuqv, fai buatc dangx-donx nyei mienh maiv maaih haaix nyungc torngv sin,
31.34: weic zuqc yie gamh nziex zuangx mienh camv, yaac gamh nziex douh zong mienh mangc piex yie, yie ziouc maiv ko lo yaac maiv cuotv gaengh ka'ndau.
31.18: (weic zuqc ninh lunx nyei ziangh hoc yie dorh ninh hlo daaih hnangv benx ninh nyei die nor, ninh yiem maa nyei ga'sie cuotv daaih yie goux ninh),
31.22: tov bun yie nyei mba'dauh caux mbungv-zeih ndutv mingh, yaac bun yie nyei buoz yiem mbungv-daaux nauv ndutv,
31.23: weic zuqc Tin-Hungh bun daaih nyei zeqc naanc bun yie gamh nziex haic. Yaac weic ninh nyei haangh daauh yie maiv haih zoux naaiv nyungc sic.
31.13: “Se gorngv yie nyei nouh gauv nouh beiz daaih gox yie, yie mangc piex maiv muangx ninh mbuo gox nyei waac,
31.9: “Se gorngv yie nyei hnyouv zuqc baeng mingh lorz m'sieqv dorn, yie yaac bingx jienv yiem yie nyei juangc laangz mienh nyei gaengh ndaangc zuov,
31.40: tov bun njimv cuotv div mbiauh witv, bun miev-zueix cuotv div mbiauh mbaali.” Yopv gorngv nyei waac nzengc mi'aqv.
31.26: se gorngv yie buatc mba'hnoi ziux cuotv njang, fai buatc hlaax nyei njang-laangc jiex gu'nguaaic,
31.5: “Se gorngv yie zoux jaav nyei jauv, yie nyei zaux yaac siepv-siepv nyei mingh nduov mienh,
31.27: yie nyei hnyouv beic ndiev zuqc yuoqc, yie nyei nzuih zom yie nyei buoz bun cing taaih ninh mbuo,
31.38: “Se gorngv yie nyei ndau gox yie, laih nyei ndau-zuonx lomh nzoih nyiemv,
31.14: wuov nyungc Tin-Hungh jiez daaih naaic yie oix zuqc hnangv haaix nor zoux? Ninh zaah naaic yie nyei ziangh hoc yie oix zuqc hnangv haaix nor dau?
31.3: Ninh maiv zeiz oix bun zoux maiv horpc nyei mienh zuqc zeqc naanc, yaac bun baamz zuiz nyei mienh zuqc sic fai?
31.7: “Se gorngv yie nyei zaux-mbiec yangh pien zien jauv, yie nyei hnyouv yaac gan yie nyei m'zing, se gorngv yie nyei buoz maaih haaix nyungc zuiz guoqv jienv,
31.39: se gorngv yie nyanc ndau nyei gaeng-zuangx yaac maiv cuotv nyaanh, bun loz-ndau-ziouv guangc maengc,
31.36: Yie ziouc an jienv yie nyei mba'dauh, yaac ndongx jienv hnangv hungh ningv.
31.10: gunv bun yie nyei auv weic ganh dauh m'jangc dorn morc mbuonv, yaac bun ninh caux ganh dauh m'jangc dorn bueix.
31.2: Yiem gu'nguaaic nyei Tin-Hungh oix bun yie duqv nyei buonc se haaix nyungc? Yiem hlang nyei dorngx Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh oix bun yie duqv nzipc haaix nyungc?
31.1: “Yie caux yie nyei m'zing laengz jiez ngaengc waac. Wuov nyungc yie hnangv haaix nor haih hanc cing-nzengc nyei sieqv?
31.31: se gorngv yiem yie nyei ndopv-liuh nyei mienh maiv gorngv, ‘Maaih haaix dauh maiv duqv nyanc ninh nyei ziouv nyei nyanc hopv beuv?’
31.6: tov Tin-Hungh nziang yie yiem baengh fim nyei tin-baengh nziangx, ninh ziouc hiuv duqv yie maiv zoux dorngc.
31.8: gunv bun yie zuangx yaac bun ganh dauh nyanc, yaac tov weic yie cuotv daaih nyei gaeng-zuangx liemh nzungh baeng cuotv.
31.24: “Se gorngv yie longc jiem zoux yie kaux nyei dorngx, aengx mbuox zien jiem, ‘Meih benx yie kaux wuonv nyei dorngx,’
31.25: se gorngv yie weic yie maaih zinh zoih bungx-zuoqc, fai weic yie nyei buoz zornc duqv camv njien-youh,
31.29: “Se gorngv yie buatc nzorng yie wuov deix zuqc baaic, buatc ninh mbuo zuqc orqv sic ziouc njien-youh a'hneiv,
31.11: Hnangv naaic za'gengh waaic nyei sic, siemv zuiz jien zungv oix zuqc dingc zuiz,
31.32: (yiem go daaih nyei mienh maiv zuqc yiem hei-horngc jiex muonz, yie nyei gaengh koi nqoi zipv jiex jauv nyei mienh),
31.16: “Se gorngv yie ngaengc jienv maiv tengx dongh mienh jomc mienh oix duqv nyei, fai bun auv-guaav nyei m'zing baeqc baeqc mangc,

6.21: Ih zanc meih mbuo weic yie se hnangv naaic aqv. Meih mbuo buatc yie zuqc kouv nyei sic ziouc haeqv meih mbuo gamh nziex.
6.15: Yie nyei gorx-youz nduov yie hnangv wuom-seix, aengx hnangv ndoqv-zuonx haih nqaai nzengc.
6.12: Yie nyei qaqv se la'bieiv nyei qaqv fai? Yie nyei orv sin benx dongh siqv fai?
6.17: Yuoqv nyei ziangh hoc sorng yuqc mi'aqv. Nyutc jorm ziouc mitc nzengc, maiv yiem ninh nyei dorngx.
6.30: Yie gorngv nyei waac maaih haaix nyungc dorngc fai? Meih mbuo hnamv daaih yie maiv haih seix maiv cuotv zeqc naanc?
6.20: Ninh mbuo maaih lamh hnamv haih duqv mv baac maiv duqv aqv. Mingh taux wuov ninh mbuo ziouc hnyouv lunc nzengc.
6.4: weic zuqc Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh nyei forng-cang yiem yie nyei sin, forng-cang nyei ndie-doqc biaux gormx sin, yie zuqc Tin-Hungh longc nyungc-nyungc haeqv yie.
6.28: “Ih zanc tov meih mbuo mangc yie, yie maiv dorng jienv meih mbuo gorngv-baeqc.
6.19: Yiem Temaa Deic gapv doic cuotv jauv nyei mienh lorz wuom, Qe^mbaa nyei jiex jauv saeng-eix mienh maaih lamh hnamv.
6.18: Gapv doic cuotv jauv nyei mienh leih ninh mbuo nyei jauv, ninh mbuo bieqc deic-bung-huaang ziouc zuqc mietc.
6.22: Yie gorngv jiex ‘Tov meih mbuo bun zingh nyeic yie’? Fai ‘Longc meih mbuo nyei zinh zoih nzuiz nyaanh hmuangx bun yie’?
6.23: Fai yie gorngv jiex ‘Njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei win-wangv nyei buoz-ndiev’? Fai ‘Zuoqc yie yiem zeix mienh nyei mienh nyei buoz-ndiev cuotv daaih’?
6.13: Yie ganh zungv maiv maaih qaqv tengx yie ganh aqv. Yie yaac jomc za'eix mi'aqv.
6.9: Feix duqv Tin-Hungh hlienx yie huv muonc, sung ninh nyei buoz pai yie guangc.
6.26: Maiv lamh hnamv nyei mienh gorngv nyei waac se hnangv nziaaux nor, wuov nyungc meih mbuo weic haaix diuc oix dau wuov deix waac?
6.5: Hieh lorh maaih miev nyanc, ninh heuc nyei fai? Ngongh maaih mbiauh nqaauv nyanc, ninh heuc nyei fai?
6.27: Meih mbuo zungv dingc maengc mangc weic duqv guh hanh fu'jueiv, yaac maaic ganh nyei loz-gaeng doic weic duqv nyaanh.
6.14: “Haaix dauh duqv-eix maiv zoux longx bun ninh nyei loz-gaeng doic, wuov dauh guangc, maiv taaih Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh.
6.3: zungv gauh hniev koiv nyei saa-ziou. Weic naaiv yie nyei waac beqv nyei,
6.7: Weic yie naaiv se gamh nziev nyei ga'naaiv, yie nyei hnyouv siouc maiv duqv.
6.10: Hnangv naaic zoux haih orn yie nyei hnyouv, maiv gunv yie nyei baengc siem yie zungv njien-youh nyei tiux, weic zuqc yie maiv ngaengc Cing-Nzengc Wuov Dauh nyei waac.
6.2: “Feix duqv haih zorqv yie nzauh faanh nyei jauv daaih nziang, yie nyei yietc zungv kouv naanc an jienv tin-baengh nziangx,
6.6: Maiv maaih mueix nyei ga'naaiv maiv an nzauv haih nyanc duqv nyei fai? Jaux-orv maaih haaix nyungc mueix doc fai?
6.8: “Feix duqv ziux yie tov nyei yie gengh haih duqv, Tin-Hungh yaac oix ceix bun dongh yie oix duqv nyei.
6.24: “Njaaux yie maah! Yie ziouc maiv ko lo. Tov bun yie bieqc hnyouv yie hnangv haaix nor zoux dorngc.
6.25: Zingx nyei waac maaih hatc maaz hlo, meih mbuo gorngv-hemx mv baac gorngv-hemx haaix nyungc?
6.29: Tov meih mbuo aengx hnamv nzunc. Maiv dungx zoux maiv baengh fim. Ih zanc tov aengx hnamv nzunc. Oix zuqc bun cing yie zoux duqv zingx nyei.
6.11: “Yie maaih haaix nyungc qaqv bun yie corc haih zuov jienv? Yie nyei setv mueiz hnangv haaix nor, yie cingx daaih oix zuqc maaih noic diev?
6.16: Ndoqv gitv sorng ziouc hmuangx, sorng yaac ndui gu'nguaaic torngv jienv.

8.21: Ninh oix bun meih nyei nzuih aengx a'hneiv nyei jatv, yaac bun meih nyei nzuih njien-youh nyei heuc.
8.15: Ninh bangc ninh nyei biauv, mv baac biauv yiem maiv jienv. Ninh nanv jienv biauv mv baac biauv maiv wuonv.
8.12: Corc maeng nyei ziangh hoc maiv gaatv nor, beiv ganh nyungc miev, ninh nqaai ndaangc jiex.
8.17: Ninh nyei nzungh nzenc jienv la'bieiv, aengx njiec mingh bieqc la'bieiv-qangx.
8.20: “Mangc maah! Tin-Hungh zungv maiv guangc maiv maaih dorngx nqemh nyei mienh. Yaac maiv tengx zoux orqv nyei mienh.
8.4: Se gorngv meih nyei fu'jueiv baamz zuiz dorngc Tin-Hungh, ninh ziux ninh mbuo zoux nyei sic bun ninh mbuo zuqc dingc zuiz.
8.19: Mangc maah! Naaiv se ninh nyei jauv nyei njien-youh. Ganh deix mienh oix yiem wuov ndau cuotv daaih.
8.18: Mv baac se gorngv ninh yiem wuov norm dorngx zuqc baeng cuotv, wuov norm dorngx ziouc maiv nyiemc ninh aengx gorngv, ‘Yie zungv maiv buatc jiex meih.’
8.22: Nzorng meih wuov deix oix zuqc baaic hmien nyaiv, orqv mienh nyei ndopv-liuh yangh naaiv jiex maiv maaih aqv.”
8.13: Da'faanh la'kuqv Tin-Hungh nyei mienh yaac hnangv wuov nor. Maiv gan Tin-Hungh nyei mienh maaih lamh hnamv nyei, zungv oix zuqc mietc.
8.9: weic zuqc yie mbuo a'hnoi koqv hoqc cuotv seix, maiv hiuv haaix nyungc. Yie mbuo yaac yiem baamh gen hnangv dongh linh nor.
8.5: Se gorngv meih jienh lorz Tin-Hungh yaac jouh Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh,
8.14: Ninh kaux nyei jauv dangx mi'aqv. Ninh kaux nyei se hnangv gaeng-nyorc mbiorngz nor.
8.3: Tin-Hungh haih zoux baengh fim nyei jauv pien fai? Fai Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh haih bun zoux horpc nyei jauv pien mingh fai?
8.7: Maiv gunv meih jiez gorn wuov zanc meih faix nyei, setv mueiz nyei hnoi-nyieqc meih ziouc duqv zoux hlo.
8.10: Ninh mbuo oix njaaux meih, mbuox meih, ziux ninh mbuo mengh baeqc gorngv cuotv maiv zeiz?
8.2: “Naaiv deix waac meih oix gorngv taux haaix zanc? Meih nyei waac hnangv nziaaux buonc nor.
8.6: se gorngv meih cing-nzengc, hnyouv zingx nyei, ninh zungv oix weic meih jiez daaih, aengx bun meih nyei jaa-dingh nzuonx daaih hnangv loz wuov nor.
8.8: “Yie tov meih, naaic loz-hnoi mienh yaac hnamv mangc gaax ong-taaix mbuo lorz buatc haaix nyungc,
8.11: Maiv maaih njaangh, cie-doix yienh miev haih cuotv nyei fai? Maiv maaih wuom, luoqc diqc haih hiaangx nyei fai?
8.16: Ninh se hnangv miev, nyutc njang nyei ziangh hoc hiaangx daaih, ninh nyei luangh louc buangv ninh nyei huingx.

24.21: Ninh mbuo pienx maiv yungz jiex gu'nguaaz nyei m'sieqv dorn, yaac maiv zoux longx bun auv-guaav.
24.15: Hienx auv nyei mienh zuov jienv nziemx-yaangh nyei ziangh hoc taux. Ninh gorngv, ‘Maiv maaih haaix dauh nyei m'zing duqv buatc yie.’ Ninh yaac buang jienv ninh nyei hmien.
24.12: Yiem zingh gu'nyuoz maaih aav lamh daic nyei mienh njunh nyei qiex cuotv, zuqc mun nyei mienh heuc jienv tov tengx, mv baac Tin-Hungh maiv muangx ninh mbuo daux gaux tov nyei waac.
24.17: Mapv maengh mapv hmuangx nyei ziangh hoc weic ninh mbuo yietc zungv se hnangv lungh ndorm nyei njang, weic zuqc ninh mbuo guenx lungh muonz zanc gamh nziex nyei sic.
24.20: Ninh mbuo nyei maa zungv la'kuqv ninh mbuo, gaeng-mau nyanc nzengc ninh mbuo nyei sei haiz gaam nyei. Maiv maaih haaix dauh jangx duqv ninh nyei mbuox. Orqv mienh hnangv ndiangx nor, nauv ndutv.
24.4: Ninh mbuo fongv guh hanh fu'jueiv cuotv jauv-hlen, lungh ndiev nyei mouz laanh mienh jomc mienh bingx nzengc.
24.19: Lungh haanz, nyutc doqc bun sorng yuqc mingh nzengc. Yiemh gen fih hnangv nyei bun baamz zuiz wuov deix zutc nzengc mi'aqv.
24.18: “Orqv mienh hnangv wuom-mbiaauz siepv-siepv mbiouh jienv gan wuom-minc mingh. Ninh mbuo yiem deic-bung duqv nyei buonc zuqc zioux. Ninh mbuo maiv duqv mingh ninh mbuo nyei a'ngunc huingx.
24.22: Mv baac Tin-Hungh longc ninh nyei qaqv mietc nzengc henv haic nyei mienh. Tin-Hungh yietv dongz sin ninh mbuo ziouc daic nzengc.
24.23: Tin-Hungh ceix baengh orn bun ninh mbuo, bun ninh mbuo maaih dorngx kaux, mv baac ninh nyei m'zing zanc-zanc mangc jienv ninh mbuo zoux nyei jauv.
24.13: “Aengx maaih mienh nqemh njang, ninh mbuo maiv zuoqc njang nyei jauv, yaac maiv gan njang nyei jauv yangh.
24.9: Orqv mienh caangv maiv maaih die nyei guh hanh fu'jueiv yiem maa nyei la'kuotv mingh, zorqv mienh jomc mienh nyei gu'nguaaz zoux dorngx-daauh.
24.5: Hnangv yiem deic-bung-huaang nyei hieh lorh, mienh jomc mienh cuotv mingh jiex naaiv jiex wuov lorz nyanc. Ninh mbuo kaux deic-bung-huaang uix ninh mbuo nyei fu'jueiv.
24.14: Lungh maiv gaengh njang, daix mienh nyei mienh jiez sin, weic mingh daix mienh jomc mienh caux dangx-donx nyei mienh. Lungh muonz zanc ninh zoux zaqc nimc ga'naaiv.
24.3: Ninh mbuo zorqv guh hanh fu'jueiv nyei lorh, yaac zorqv auv-guaav nyei ngongh zoux dorngx-daauh.
24.7: Ninh mbuo laengh gaengv nyei bueix jiex muonz, maiv maaih lui-houx zuqv. Juangv nyei ziangh hoc maiv maaih haaix nyungc homc.
24.10: Mienh jomc mienh jiex naaiv jiex wuov laengh gaengv nyei yiem, maiv maaih lui-houx zuqv, ninh mbuo hnyouv sie jienv tengx mienh ndaam mbiauh zeiv.
24.2: Mienh suiv ndeic-nqenx nyei dongc, ninh mbuo caangv ba'gi yungh caux yungh dorh mingh yungz.
24.1: “Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh weic haaix diuc maiv dingc siemv zuiz nyei hnoi? Hiuv duqv ninh wuov deix weic haaix diuc maiv duqv buatc ninh dingc daaih nyei hnoi?
24.6: Ninh mbuo mingh mienh nyei ndeic nzauz mbiauh dorngc, yaac mingh orqv mienh nyei a'ngunc huingx nzauz gaeqv liuz zengc njiec nyei biouv.
24.8: Ninh mbuo yiem mbong zuqc mbiungc liemh ndorn, ziouc qam la'bieiv weic zuqc maiv maaih dorngx bingx.
24.24: Ninh mbuo duqv mienh taaih se weic caamx baav hnangv, ziang naaic maiv buatc mi'aqv. Ninh mbuo hnangv miev nor, nyaux nqaai, yaac hnangv zuqc gaatv nyei mbiauh dorv nor.
24.25: “Se gorngv maiv zeiz hnangv naaic, haaix dauh haih bun cing yie gorngv-baeqc? Haaix dauh haih bun cing yie gorngv nyei waac se maiv zien?”
24.11: Ninh mbuo yiem orqv mienh nyei yietc liouz yietc liouz ga'lanv ndiangx mbu'ndongx zaax ga'lanv youh, yaac yiem nyueih a'ngunc biouv nyei zorngh nyueih biouv, mv baac ninh mbuo jaang nqaatv jienv yiem.
24.16: Lungh muonz zanc janx-zaqc mborqv tong kuotv bieqc biauv, lungh hnoi zanc ninh mbuo bingx, ninh mbuo maiv hiuv duqv njang.

25.2: “Tin-Hungh maaih hlo jiex nyei lingc gunv. Maanc mienh oix zuqc taaih ninh. Ninh yiem ninh hlang nyei dorngx liepc baengh orn.
25.5: Ziux Tin-Hungh mangc, liemh hlaax maiv njang, hleix yaac maiv cing-nzengc.
25.6: Wuov nyungc, baamh mienh kungx hnangv gaeng-mau, mienh yaac hnangv naang-nzung, gauh fatv maiv cing-nzengc.”
25.4: Wuov nyungc baamh mienh hnangv haaix nor haih yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien zoux duqv horpc? Yiem m'sieqv dorn cuotv seix nyei mienh hnangv haaix nor haih cing-nzengc?
25.3: Maaih haaix dauh haih saauv duqv hingh ninh nyei tin-baeng? Ninh nyei njang cuotv daaih maaih haaix dauh ninh ziux maiv taux?

29.21: “Mienh muangx yie yaac zuov jienv, sekv nzieqc nyei muangx yie caangh laangh nyei waac.
29.15: Yie zoux m'zing maengh mienh nyei m'zing, yaac zoux zaux mbai mienh nyei zaux.
29.12: weic zuqc yie tengx heuc jienv tov nyei mienh jomc mienh caux maiv maaih mienh tengx nyei guh hanh fu'jueiv.
29.17: Yie mborqv nauv mienh waaic mienh nyei nyaah ngau, yaac aapv ninh bungx guangc nyaah ngaatc jienv nyei ga'naaiv.
29.20: Mienh zanc-zanc taaih yie, yie nyei qaqv yaac zanc-zanc henv, maiv tuix.’
29.4: Wuov zanc yie lunx, henv nyei ziangh hoc, Tin-Hungh zoux yie nyei doic yaac beu jienv yie nyei ndopv-liuh.
29.19: Yie hnangv diuh ndiangx maaih nzungh ndaauv jienv mingh taux wuom, yaac maaih mbiungc-suiv ziangh muonz yiem yie nyei nquaah.
29.18: “Wuov zanc yie hnamv, ‘Yie duqv yiem yie ganh nyei biauv daic, aengx jaa yie nyei hnoi-nyieqc ndongc saa-ziou camv.
29.22: Yie gorngv liuz ninh mbuo maiv ko lo, yie nyei waac hnangv mbiungc-suiv nor, ndiepv ninh mbuo.
29.23: Ninh mbuo zuov yie hnangv zuov mbiungc, yaac morngx nqoi nzuih hnangv zuov cun-gen mbiungc.
29.13: Aav lamh zuqc mietc nyei mienh buang waac bun yie, yie yaac bun auv-guaav nyei hnyouv duqv njien-youh nyei baaux nzung.
29.9: Baeqc fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maiv ko lo, longc buoz buang jienv ganh nyei nzuih.
29.5: Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh corc caux yie yiem, yie nyei naamh nyouz yaac weih gormx yie.
29.14: Yie longc zoux horpc nyei jauv dorngx lui zuqv, yie zoux baengh fim nyei sic dorngx domh lui-ndaauv caux m'nqorngv-beu.
29.3: Wuov zanc ninh nyei dang ziux jienv yie nyei m'nqorngv gu'nguaaic, ninh nyei njang ziux yie yangh hmuangx nyei dorngx.
29.7: “Yie cuotv taux zingh gaengh nyei ziangh hoc, yiem domh zuangx zaamc zueiz jienv yie nyei weic,
29.10: Maaih mengh dauh nyei mienh yaac sekv nzieqc nyei, ninh mbuo nqapc jienv nzuih, maiv ko lo.
29.2: “O feix duqv yie nyei maengc haih nzuonx daaih hnangv zinh ndaangc nyei hlaax-nyieqc, hnangv Tin-Hungh goux jienv yie wuov deix hnoi.
29.1: Yopv aengx borqv jienv gorngv ninh nyei jauv-louc. Ninh gorngv,
29.6: Yie yangh nyei jauv zungv maaih ngongh nyorx nzaaux zaux, la'bieiv yaac weic yie liouc cuotv ga'lanv youh hnangv ndoqv nor.
29.8: mienh lunx mienh buatc yie ziouc simv nqoi, mienh gox mienh souv jiez daaih.
29.24: Ninh mbuo hnyouv mau nyei ziangh hoc, yie zoux hmien njang nyei jatv. Ninh mbuo buatc yie nyei hmien njang, jatv, ziouc tengx ninh mbuo maiv nzauh.
29.25: Yie zoux ninh mbuo nyei bieiv zeiv, yaac ginv jauv bun ninh mbuo yangh. Yie hnangv hungh diex yiem ninh nyei jun-baeng guanh mbu'ndongx, yaac hnangv dauh orn hnyouv nyei mienh orn nzauh nyiemv nyei mienh nyei hnyouv.
29.11: “Da'faanh m'normh haiz nyei mienh, ninh mbuo gorngv yie maaih orn-lorqc, m'zing buatc wuov deix yaac taaih yie,
29.16: Yie dorngx mienh jomc mienh nyei die, yaac tengx dongh yie maiv hiuv nyei mienh mbenc ninh mbuo nyei sic.

11.15: Wuov zanc meih duqv cau hmien yaac maiv lamh nqemh dorngx, meih ziouc yiem wuonv yaac maiv gamh nziex.
11.18: Weic meih maaih lamh hnamv meih ziouc yiem duqv wuonv. Tin-Hungh oix beu jienv meih, bun meih duqv baengh orn nyei hitv kuonx.
11.12: Mv baac hngongx nyei mienh haih maaih cong-mengh nor, hieh lorh haih njiec dorn benx dauh mienh aqv.
11.13: “Se gorngv meih mbenc sung hnyouv aengx sung jienv buoz hungx jienv ninh,
11.19: Meih oix bueix njiec, maiv maaih mienh haeqv meih. Mienh camv yaac oix daaih tov meih tengx.
11.5: Mv baac feix duqv Tin-Hungh caux meih gorngv. Feix duqv ninh morngx nqoi nzuih gorngv meih.
11.20: Mv baac orqv mienh nyei m'zing oix mbuov mingh, ninh mbuo lorz maiv buatc haaix nyungc jauv biaux. Ninh mbuo maaih lamh hnamv nyei se dangx qiex daic mi'aqv.”
11.11: Tin-Hungh hiuv duqv maiv lamh longc nyei mienh. Ninh buatc ninh mbuo zoux nyei waaic sic, ninh yaac maiv zeiz oix samx mangc fai?
11.14: se gorngv meih maaih zuiz oix zuqc guangc go-go nyei, yaac maiv dungx bun waaic sic yiem meih nyei ndopv-liuh gu'nyuoz.
11.3: Meih gorngv nyei henh waac haih bun mienh sekv fai? Meih huotv mienh nyei ziangh hoc, maiv horpc zuqc maaih mienh bun meih nyaiv fai?
11.10: “Se gorngv Tin-Hungh jiex mingh yaac zorqv meih wuonx jienv, aengx heuc siemv zuiz, haaix dauh haih laanh ninh?
11.2: “Gorngv waac ndongc naaic camv maiv zuqc dau fai? Gorngv waac camv nyei mienh oix zuqc funx ninh horpc nyei fai?
11.1: Naa^aa^me Mienh, Sofaa, ziouc dau gorngv,
11.4: Weic zuqc meih gorngv, ‘Yie gorngv nyei doz-leiz se zien nyei, ziux Tin-Hungh mangc, yie yaac cing-nzengc nyei.’
11.6: Ninh ziouc zorqv gem jienv nyei cong-mengh mbuox meih, weic zuqc ninh nyei cong-mengh maaih camv-bung. Meih oix zuqc hiuv aqv, Tin-Hungh dingc meih nyei zuiz, zungv gauh zoqc meih zoux dorngc horpc zuqc dingc nyei.
11.8: Ninh nyei cong-mengh gauh hlang jiex lungh. Meih haih zoux haaix nyungc? Se gauh ndo jiex yiemh gen. Meih haih hiuv haaix nyungc?
11.9: Ndorqc mangc gaax, zungv gauh ndaauv ndau-beih, yaac gauh jangv koiv.
11.7: “Meih haih zaah duqv toux Tin-Hungh hnangv haaix nor fai? Meih haih hiuv duqv nzengc Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh fai?
11.17: Meih ziangh seix zaangc nyei maengc oix gauh njang lungh aanx zanc nyei njang, maiv gunv maaih hmuangx, mv baac oix hnangv lungh ndorm nor.
11.16: Meih ziouc la'kuqv meih nyei kouv naanc. Kungx jangx jienv hnangv benx liouc jiex mingh nyei wuom hnangv.

32.21: Yie maiv mangc haaix dauh nyei hmien, maiv la'guaih ceng haaix dauh.
32.15: “Ninh mbuo gamh nziex, maiv aengx dau aqv, zungv maiv maaih waac dau.
32.12: Yie longc hnyouv muangx meih mbuo, yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh dau duqv horpc Yopv. Meih mbuo maiv maaih yietc laanh haih dau Yopv nzaeng nyei waac.
32.17: Yie ganh yaac oix dau, yie oix ziux yie hnamv nyei jauv gorngv.
32.20: Yie hnangv haaix oix zuqc gorngv cingx duqv kuh yiem, yie oix zuqc morngx nqoi nzuih dau.
32.4: E^li^hu zuov jienv oix caux Yopv gorngv weic zuqc wuov deix gauh gox ninh.
32.19: Yie nyei hnyouv hnangv a'ngunc diuv dapv mbuoqc, maiv maaih dorngx bun qiex cuotv. Yaac hnangv siang-ndopv-mbuoqc haih zungx mbaaix.
32.18: Weic zuqc yie maaih waac camv, nyienz maiv jienv, yie nyei hnyouv aapv yie gorngv.
32.22: Weic zuqc yie maiv hiuv duqv hnangv haaix nor la'guaih ceng, se gorngv yie la'guaih ceng, Zeix Yie Wuov Dauh oix siepv-siepv nyei mietc yie.
32.13: Faix fim, maiv dungx gorngv, ‘Yie mbuo lorz duqv cong-mengh. Bun Tin-Hungh ganh dau ninh, maiv zeiz mienh.’
32.9: Se maiv zeiz laaix hnyangx-jeiv hlang, mienh cingx maaih cong-mengh, fai siouc nyuonh ndaauv cingx bun ninh mbuo mengh baeqc haaix nyungc se horpc.
32.5: E^li^hu buatc naaiv deix buo laanh mienh maiv maaih waac dau ninh ziouc qiex jiez haic.
32.14: Yopv maiv zeiz zueih yietv zueih nyeic doix yie gorngv, yie zungv maiv longc waac hnangv meih mbuo nor dau.
32.3: Ninh yaac qiex jiez Yopv nyei buo dauh doic, weic zuqc ninh mbuo lorz maiv duqv waac dau, maiv gunv ninh mbuo gorngv Yopv dorngc.
32.7: Yie gorngv, ‘Hnyangx-jeiv gox oix zuqc gorngv, bun siouc nyuonh ndaauv nyei longc cong-mengh njaaux mienh.’
32.10: Weic naaiv yie gorngv. Muangx yie maah! Tov bun yie ziux yie nyei hnyouv hnamv nyei gorngv.
32.2: Mv baac maaih dauh Laam Fingx, Mbusi Mienh, Mbaa^laa^ken nyei dorn, E^li^hu, qiex jiez. Ninh qiex jiez Yopv weic zuqc Yopv gorngv ninh ganh zoux duqv horpc, maiv zeiz Tin-Hungh.
32.1: Naaiv deix buo laanh mienh ziouc dingh njiec, maiv dau Yopv, weic zuqc ziux Yopv mangc, ninh ganh zoux kuv mienh.
32.6: Mbusi Mienh, Mbaa^laa^ken nyei dorn, E^li^hu, ziouc dau, “Yie hnyangx-jeiv lunx, meih mbuo gox. Weic naaiv yie daamv faix, maiv gaamv gorngv yie hnamv cuotv nyei waac bun meih mbuo muangx.
32.8: Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh nyei qiex bun baamh mienh nyei hnyouv maaih banh zeic haih mengh baeqc.
32.11: “Yie zuov jienv muangx meih mbuo gorngv nyei waac. Yie muangx meih mbuo hnamv cuotv nyei za'eix, yaac zuov jienv meih mbuo lorz waac gorngv.
32.16: Ninh mbuo maiv gorngv waac, yie corc oix zuqc zuov fai? Weic zuqc ninh mbuo souv jienv wuov, yaac maiv maaih waac aengx dau.

16.21: Tov bun ninh tengx mienh jouh Tin-Hungh, hnangv mienh tengx ninh nyei loz-gaeng doic jouh nor.
16.15: “Yie lunh la'maah ndie-cou nitv jienv yie nyei ndopv, yie suei nzengc ziouc bueix jienv nie-mbung.
16.12: Yie kuh yiem nyei ziangh hoc ninh zorqv yie wuotv nauv. Ninh nanv jienv yie nyei jaang guaeqv yie muonc nzengc. Ninh zorqv yie zoux ninh nyei mbaeqc.
16.17: maiv gunv yie nyei buoz maiv zoux haaix nyungc doqc, yie daux gaux nyei waac yaac cing-nzengc.
16.20: Yie nyei loz-gaeng doic huotv yie, yie nyei m'zing liouc wuom-mueic bun Tin-Hungh.
16.4: Se gorngv meih mbuo caux yie tiuv dorngx yiem, yie mv baac haih gorngv hnangv meih mbuo nor. Yie haih borqv jienv yietc kang jiex yietc kang nyei waac gorngv meih mbuo, aengx dorng jienv meih mbuo huangx m'nqorngv.
16.19: Ih zanc maaih dauh yiem tin-dorngh tengx yie zoux zorng-zengx, beu yie wuov dauh yiem hlang nyei dorngx.
16.18: “Ndau aah! Maiv dungx buang yie nyei nziaamv. Maiv dungx bun yie heuc nyei qiex maaih dorngx hitv.
16.22: “Weic zuqc aengx jiex liuz i ziex hnyangx, yie ziouc gan maiv nzuonx nyei jauv mingh.
16.13: Ninh nyei buonv juang-zinx mienh weih gormx yie. Ninh buonv tong yie nyei nyutc zeiv yaac maiv korv-lienh, yaac dox yie nyei daamv cuotv njiec ndau.
16.9: Tin-Hungh qiex jiez jienv betv yie yaac nzorng yie, dorng jienv yie ngaatc nyaah. Yie nyei win-wangv njatc m'zing mangc yie.
16.5: Mv baac yie haih longc yie nyei nzuih ceix meih mbuo henv jiez daaih, yie nyei nzuih meix yaac oix orn meih mbuo nyei you-nzauh.
16.14: Ninh mborqv yie yietc nzunc jiex yietc nzunc, ninh tiux daaih mborqv hnangv mborqv jaax henv nyei baeng.
16.3: Meih maiv dingh maiv hitv nyei gorngv waac maiv haih jomc fai? Maaih haaix nyungc cuoqv zuqc meih dau waac?
16.7: Tin-Hungh aac, ih zanc meih zungv bun yie kuonx kouv. Meih bun yie nyei biauv zong mienh zuqc baaic nzengc.
16.10: Ninh mbuo morngx nzuih bun yie. Ninh mbuo mbaix yie nyei hmien huotv yie. Ninh mbuo gapv zunv daaih oix zoux bun yie.
16.2: “Naaiv nyungc waac yie haiz camv! haic aqv. Meih mbuo dauh dauh oix orn hnyouv mv baac meih mbuo bun mienh jaa nzauh.
16.6: “Maiv gunv yie gorngv waac, yie mun nyei jauv maiv sienc. Se gorngv yie nyienz jienv maiv gorngv, yie mun nyei dorngx maiv haih gauh longx.
16.8: Meih bun yie soqv, jaic nzengc, yie ndongc naaiv jaic ziouc zoux zorng-zengx gox yie.
16.11: Tin-Hungh zorqv yie jiu bun orqv mienh, yaac zoi yie yiem mienh waaic mienh nyei buoz-ndiev.
16.16: Weic zuqc yie nyiemv, hmien siqv nzengc, m'zing-ndopv yaac hmuangx,
